title: Amber International Raises $25.5M in Private Placement to Advance Crypto Strategy
body: Singapore-based crypto firm Amber International has announced the completion of a $25.5 million private placement to foster its $100 million crypto ecosystem reserve fund. The private placement was priced at $10.45 per share, the company said in a statement on Thursday . The price is based on a 5% discount to the company‚Äôs three-day volume-weighted average trading price. ‚ÄúProceeds from the private placement will be strategically used to enhance Amber International‚Äôs $100 million Crypto Reserve initiative, which is designed to support long-term ecosystem alignment and product innovation.‚Äù The raise saw participation from institutional investors, including CMAG Funds, Mile Green, Pantera Capital, Kingkey Financial International, and others. Amber issued more than 12 million Class A ordinary shares, equal to about 2.44 million American Depositary Share (ADS), on Nasdaq. Amber International Crypto Reserve Allocations The Nasdaq-listed company announced its crypto reserve strategy early this year diversifying allocations in Bitcoin , Ethereum and Solana . Amber is now extending its coverage to Binance Coin, Ripple‚Äôs XRP and SUI, the announcement added. This signals a wave of institutional conviction, especially when BNB witnesses $50M scooped up by Nano Labs . Further, XRP is regaining institutional relevance after a June dip and is holding above $2.25, while SUI‚Äôs 54% dev growth and bullish sentiment are offset by technical consolidation. The company noted that it will use crypto reserves to align with developers operating on these blockchains, aiming to offer liquidity, capital, and technical support. The approach directly addresses one of the critical pain points ‚Äì the lack of institutional-grade infrastructure to support blockchain adoption and scalability. ‚ÄúThe Reserve will further empower the Company to remain at the forefront of blockchain innovation in areas such as Real World Assets (RWA) and AgentFi, strengthening its leadership in the next wave of Web3 financial infrastructure,‚Äù Amber noted. Amber‚Äôs stock closed down 6.7% on Thursday, per Yahoo Finance data . Further, the shares have dropped 23.8% in the past five days and 12% in the last month The post Amber International Raises $25.5M in Private Placement to Advance Crypto Strategy appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Major Tax Cut Bill Passes House of Representatives in the US ‚Äì When Will Trump Sign It? What Will Be the Impact? Experts Respond
body: The U.S. House of Representatives has formally passed President Donald Trump‚Äôs ‚ÄúOne Big Beautiful Bill,‚Äù one of his most comprehensive legislative packages. The bill, which brings together a range of priorities from tax cuts to border security, aims to enact a series of goals that Republicans have been working on for a long time. The bill includes making permanent Trump‚Äôs tax cuts that went into effect in 2017, no tax on tip income, increased spending on immigration enforcement, and construction of a border wall. Trump announced weeks before taking office that the bill would be a large and powerful package that would ‚Äúget the country back on its feet.‚Äù ‚ÄúMembers of Congress are working on powerful legislation that will bring our country back and make it greater than ever,‚Äù Trump said on Jan. 5. ‚ÄúWe must secure our borders, unleash American energy, and renew the Trump Tax Cuts, the largest tax cut in history.‚Äù Republicans used the advantage of having a majority in both chambers to pass the bill in the House on May 22. However, some changes were made in the Senate to pass the bill with a simple majority. After these changes, the bill was sent back to the House for a final vote and was approved in its final form in the vote held today. Related News: Company Known as the MicroStrategy of Solana Purchases Massive Amount of SOL The White House announced that President Trump will sign the ‚ÄúOne Big Beautiful Bill‚Äù at midnight on Friday. Economists are divided on the economic impact of the law. Bernard Yaros, chief U.S. economist at Oxford Economics, predicts that spending will increase in the short term and the economy will be boosted, particularly by tax cuts on tips, overtime, car loan interest and expanded state and local tax credits. But he says that in the long run, these individual tax cuts will lead to price increases and will have limited economic growth. Yaros also said that the effects of cuts to social assistance programs such as Medicaid and SNAP and the rollback of climate incentives under the Disinflation Act will be felt more clearly starting in 2026, and that real GDP will increase by only 0.1 percent by 2030. In response, the Main Street Alliance, which represents more than 30,000 small businesses in the U.S., called the bill a ‚ÄúBig, Ugly Bill.‚Äù ‚ÄúThis bill surrenders the promise of freedom and justice to the interests of monopolies and billionaire donors, while working families are still footing the bill,‚Äù it said in a statement. The International Monetary Fund (IMF) also warned about the law. IMF spokesperson Julie Kozack said Trump‚Äôs new tax law could make it harder to reduce budget deficits and public debt in the coming years. ‚ÄúThis law runs counter to the goal of reducing debt in the medium term,‚Äù Kozack said, adding that according to Congressional Budget Office data, the law would increase the budget deficit by $3.3 trillion. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Major Tax Cut Bill Passes House of Representatives in the US ‚Äì When Will Trump Sign It? What Will Be the Impact? Experts Respond

title: Russian Malware Campaign Adds Downward Pressure to Internet Computer's ICP Token
body: Internet Computer Protocol (ICP) is trading at $4.8373, down 5.18% in the past 24 hours, while the broader crypto market as gauged by the CoinDesk 20 Index dropped only half as much. ICP faced renewed selling pressure as geopolitical risks and cybersecurity threats rattled digital asset markets. The decline comes amid troubling findings from cybersecurity firm Koi Security, which uncovered a network of malicious browser extensions targeting cryptocurrency users. The report identified more than 40 fake Firefox add-ons designed to mimic popular wallets like MetaMask and Coinbase. These extensions, some of which remain live in browser stores, are believed to have stolen sensitive credentials from unsuspecting users since at least April 2025. Technical metadata and language artifacts in the attack infrastructure point to Russian-speaking actors, according to Koi. These findings added a new layer of concern for crypto investors already navigating macroeconomic uncertainty and fragmented global regulation. ICP‚Äôs price reaction was swift, with the token falling through key support at $5.00, according to CoinDesk Research's technical analysis model. The bearish move was amplified by increased trading volumes during key selloffs at 12:00 and 20:00 UTC on July 3. The coin‚Äôs vulnerability to broader risk sentiment was on full display, as the cyber threat narrative intersected with elevated volatility to push prices sharply lower. The fake wallet attack ‚Äî by exploiting the same trust layer users depend on to store digital assets ‚Äî has heightened awareness around security risks in decentralized ecosystems. For projects like Internet Computer, which promote on-chain infrastructure and self-custody, the reputational risk from these types of exploits can weigh heavily on investor sentiment even when not directly tied to the protocol itself. Technical Analysis Highlights All times cited are UTC. ICP-USD declined 4.3% to $4.8373 between July 3 07:00 and July 4 06:00. Price action formed a descending channel, with resistance near $5.13 and a decisive breakdown below $5.00. Sharp selloffs occurred at 12:00 and 20:00 on July 3, accompanied by above-average volume. The token‚Äôs overall range was $0.26 (5.1%), underscoring heightened volatility. A 1.17% drop occurred between 05:52 and 06:51 on July 4, with the price dipping below $4.90. Temporary support emerged at $4.88 around 06:30, followed by a mild recovery stalling at $4.89. Volume exceeded 94,000 units during the 06:27‚Äì06:30 window, likely driven by institutional activity. Final minutes showed consolidation, with low volatility suggesting possible range-bound action ahead. title: How may the heavy demand for Bitcoin impact the Bitcoin lending market?
body: On July 1, 2025, major lending platform Ledn stopped supporting Ether and turned into a 100% Bitcoin-focused company. While the move aligns well with the wave of Bitcoin-mania, the same focus on Bitcoin from corporations, institutions, and governments poses new threats for the Bitcoin lending business. Full focus on Bitcoin Ledn had plans to drop support for other cryptocurrencies aside from Bitcoin. While Bitcoin maximalists may see it as a manifestation of Bitcoin purism, the company explained the move differently: it aims to make its product simpler and focus on excelling in the only operation type‚ÄìBitcoin lending. Regardless of the reasoning, the move is well-received among those who don‚Äôt give credit to any cryptocurrency except for Bitcoin. This audience is getting increasingly visible in this cycle. now I can start recommending Ledn again. ‚Äî Brad Mills üîë‚ö°Ô∏è (@bradmillscan) July 2, 2025 Ledn co-founder Adam Reeds called this transition the return to the roots. Earlier, Ledn named risk management as the reason for a future halt on using clients‚Äô assets for yield farming. The assets are kept by Ledn itself or via the company‚Äôs partners. Bitcoin-backed loans and the current market situation In the past, the Bitcoin lending sector saw turbulence. In 2022, Celsius, BlockFi, Voyager, and Genius were shut down. Ledn looks in the future optimistically as the Trump Administration‚Äôs efforts to make the crypto business less restrictive are good for Bitcoin-backed loans ventures. One of the main moves benefiting Bitcoin lending was the repeal of the SAB 121, a controversial 2022 rule that made crypto custody really hard. Read more: SEC repeals SAB 121, easing crypto custody rules Another trend that can serve as a tailwind for Bitcoin lending is the accumulation of Bitcoin by Bitcoin treasury companies, although their activity can have a negative impact too (we‚Äôll speak about it too). Companies like Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy), Nakamoto, Metaplanet, and others are buying Bitcoin in bulk. Governments accumulate Bitcoin they got through seizing, mining, and other means. Institutional custodians like BlackRock or Fidelity rapidly grow their Bitcoin accounts, too. All of these lock huge amounts of bitcoins out of the market, which leads to stabilizing the lower edge of the Bitcoin price, which is the perfect climate for Bitcoin lending companies. The increase in the number of Bitcoin allies among institutional investors is also vital for companies like Ledn, as lending ventures need more dollars in the sector to let more operations for more people. Even in February 2025, Reeds was stating that the lending sector is ‚Äúincredibly short dollars‚Äù and needs more institutional investors to allow more people to take Bitcoin-backed mortgages, etc. Bitcoin derivatives markets (that cannot exist without Bitcoin lending) cement the BTC price stability, too. Ledn co-founder Mauricio Di Bartolomeo outlined it in his essay on responsible yield on digital assets. He writes that Bitcoin lending crushes down price volatility, makes spreads tighter, and improves the health of the spot short markets that are used as a hedge. Therefore, the market needs Bitcoin lending, and it‚Äôs another reason for companies like Ledn to come up. New threats for Bitcoin lending Everyone‚Äôs focus on Bitcoin may play a mean role for the lending sector. In the current cycle, individuals and institutions are reluctant to sell their bitcoins. Instead, everybody seems to try to accumulate as much as possible, and Bitcoin treasury companies, huge asset management companies, and governments lock up more Bitcoin than miners produce, effectively devouring liquidity. At some point, lending companies may face a situation of a Bitcoin deficit available for lending out. This, in turn, may lead to an increase in borrow rates on spot short markets, a shrinkage in short interest (it may get barely profitable), and less value clarity in the market as bearish sentiment won‚Äôt be reflected adequately on the derivatives market. This means that the price will behave less predictably, and the volatility will increase. Shorting on futures markets becomes unprofitable and riskier, too. As the Bitcoin price goes up, Bitcoin bears may lose billions in liquidations. $6,000,000,000 worth of #Bitcoin shorts to be liquidated at $120,000 üëÄ LET‚ÄôS LIQUIDATE THEM ALL üöÄ pic.twitter.com/6lzCOud4FV ‚Äî Vivek‚ö°Ô∏è (@Vivek4real_) July 3, 2025 As the short market is shrinking and borrowing Bitcoin becomes too expensive, the options market liquidity will drop. Arbitrage trading will become less flexible, which may lead to distortion in the futures market prices as they may face higher discrepancies from the spot market. On the individual side, these problems open up more exposure to counterparty risk, trust-reliance, and the need for leverage. Ironically, all of these risks are what Bitcoin was intended to fight in the first place. Conclusion The crypto market and the broader financial market have complex structures, and every action contributes to various impacts, both positive and negative ones. Heavy demand for Bitcoin by institutions, corporations, and governments may make it hard to borrow Bitcoin. It, in turn, may negatively impact the derivatives markets and lead to price volatility and liquidations on spot short markets. This may make things worse for the actor, depending on Bitcoin reserves; that‚Äôs how this circle closes. However, as the Bitcoin price stabilizes and the regulation may get friendlier, there is hope for a positive scenario. title: Where is Bitcoin Pepe headed as two dormant bitcoin wallets move BTC after 14 years
body: Two Bitcoin wallets that had remained inactive for over 14 years were reactivated late Thursday night, collectively transferring 20,000 BTC, worth approximately $2.18 billion at current prices. The unexpected movement of these long-dormant funds has drawn widespread attention across the cryptocurrency community. As the crypto market sees increased activity following Bitcoin‚Äôs rise past $110,000 and other new developments, several projects are gaining momentum and raising funds through presales. Bitcoin Pepe is one such project, currently in the final stage of its presale, with major exchange listings and partnerships already confirmed. Origins of the wallets trace back to 2011 According to onchain data, the wallets can be traced back to a transaction on April 3, 2011, when Bitcoin address ‚Äú1HqXB‚Ä¶gDwcK‚Äù transferred a total of 23,377.83 BTC to three different destinations. Two of those addresses‚Äî‚Äú12tLs‚Ä¶xj2me‚Äù and ‚Äú1KbrS‚Ä¶AWJYm‚Äù‚Äîeach received 10,000 BTC, while the remaining 3,377.83 BTC was sent to a third address, which later moved or spent the funds within the same year. Since that 2011 transfer, both 10,000 BTC wallets had remained untouched until this week. The addresses had no prior outgoing transactions until they were both activated within 30 minutes of each other, sending their entire holdings to new, unidentified addresses. The recipient wallets have not moved the funds since receiving them. At the time of writing, Bitcoin was trading at $108,800.78, down 0.61% in the last 24 hours. The trading volumes were also slightly down to $48.05 billion. Massive value appreciation Over the 14-year period of inactivity, the value of the 20,000 BTC increased dramatically, surging from $7,800 in 2011 to $2.18 billion as of early Friday morning‚Äîa staggering 13,982,800% appreciation. The original transfer took place when Bitcoin was trading at around $0.39 per coin. Despite the scale of the movement, the identity of the wallet owners remains unknown. It is also unclear whether the two addresses were controlled by the same entity or by different individuals. Bitcoin Pepe combines Bitcoin and Solana Bitcoin Pepe is carving out a distinct space within the cryptocurrency sector by combining the viral appeal of meme culture with a development focus anchored in Bitcoin infrastructure. Functioning as a Layer 2 solution, the project builds on Bitcoin‚Äôs security framework while aiming to offer scalability comparable to networks such as Solana. This combination sets Bitcoin Pepe apart from other meme-themed crypto assets. As a meme-centric Layer 2 network built on Bitcoin, Bitcoin Pepe is broadening its reach through a series of strategic partnerships. These alliances span various sectors, including gaming, content creation, decentralised finance (DeFi), and fair launch infrastructure, to build an ecosystem where the BPEP token delivers both cultural relevance and cross-chain functionality. These efforts are expected to support wider adoption and enhance the project‚Äôs visibility. Interest from institutional participants and the broader crypto community is growing, particularly around the emerging PEP-20 token standard. Investor engagement is evident in the project‚Äôs ongoing presale, which has raised over $16.295 million to date. The token is currently available at $0.0437, and the price is set to jump to $0.0458. Further momentum is being driven by confirmed exchange listings on MEXC and BitMart, with the final listing announcement scheduled for July 31. title: Best Altcoin to Invest in Now: These 2 Coins Will Have Bigger Gains Than Bitcoin (BTC) by the End of Q3

title: President Zelenskyy‚Äôs Suit Sparks $79 Million Fight on Polymarket
body: The post President Zelenskyy‚Äôs Suit Sparks $79 Million Fight on Polymarket appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy‚Äôs simple outfit has turned into a million-dollar debate on Polymarket, the popular crypto betting site. What started as a small question, ‚ÄúWill Zelenskyy wear a suit before July?‚Äù has now pulled in nearly $79 million in bets, all hinging on whether his jacket and pants combo counts as a suit. Millions Bet on Zelenskyy‚Äôs Outfit It all began when someone on Polymarket opened a market asking if Zelenskyy would appear in a suit between May 22 and June 30. On June 24, Zelenskyy showed up at a NATO meeting in the Netherlands wearing a dark jacket, shirt, pants, and trainers. Photos and videos spread fast. Some traders quickly claimed victory, saying this was a suit, but not everyone agreed. Polymarket initially ruled ‚Äúyes,‚Äù but the result has been challenged twice, leaving millions of dollars locked until a final decision comes through. This isn‚Äôt the first time Polymarket users have fought over Zelenskyy‚Äôs clothes. Back in May, a similar bet closed with the same confusion. Derek Guy also weighed in then, claiming the outfit was technically a suit because the jacket and pants were made from the same cloth. Why Zelenskyy‚Äôs Suit Matters During a highly publicized Oval Office meeting between President Donald Trump and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in early 2025, Trump openly criticized Zelenskyy, not just for his political stance, but also for his appearance and choice of attire. Although Zelenskyy has said he will wear a suit again only when Ukraine‚Äôs war with Russia is over. Until then, he sticks to military-style clothes to show solidarity with his troops.

title: The US House Designates July 14-18 as ‚ÄúCrypto Week‚Äù
body: The US House members have declared the week of July 14 as ‚ÄúCrypto Week,‚Äù another pro-crypto act focused on driving digital asset innovation in America French Hill, the chairman of the Committee on Financial Services, and GT Thompson, the chairman of the Committee on Agriculture, along with other key House leadership, endorsed this pro-innovation move on Thursday, July 3.Consequently, the US House dedicated the week spanning from July 14 to 18 to comprehensively tackling crypto-related legislation. Among the primary agenda for the week are the CLARITY Act, the Anti-CBDC bill, and the US Senate‚Äôs GENIUS Act .A Full Week Dedicated to Driving Crypto InnovationAfter the US House of Representatives passed Donald Trump‚Äôs ‚ÄúBig Beautiful Bill‚Äù on Thursday, their attention has now turned to crypto bills. Through a coordinated effort by the US House GOP, the lawmakers have dedicated a whole week to deliberating on and passing legislation specific to the digital assets industry. Crypto Week Agenda Notably, in hindsight, not many would have foreseen this week coming. Barely a year ago, the United States repelled cryptocurrencies under the Joe Biden administration, with former US SEC Chair Gary Gensler in power.Meanwhile, Trump is keeping to his promises of making America the crypto capital of the world. He recently called Bitcoin ‚Äúamazing‚Äù and claimed he had built the crypto industry. Now, the latest US House announcement reflects that the crypto innovation push is now a national interest.US House to Approve Multiple Crypto Bills in July?The US House aims to pass the GENIUS Act, a stablecoin bill that has already passed in the US Senate. The bill aims to establish clear guidelines for dollar-pegged cryptocurrencies, projected to attract trillions of dollars into the US economy. Notably, Trump has passionately called on the House to expedite the bill's delivery to him for final approval.Furthermore, the House would also attempt to pass the CLARITY Act and quickly move it to the Senate. Remarkably, the bill has already passed a vote from both the Agriculture and Financial Services Committees and now requires full House support to pass.Finally, the US House would deliberate on the Anti-CBDC Surveillance State Act, a bill that aims to prohibit the Central Bank from establishing a digital currency. The House Financial Services Committee approved the legislation with a slim 27-22 vote in April, keeping the proposal alive.Meanwhile, several remarks followed the announcement, with several members of the House of Representatives expressing their optimism ahead of ‚ÄúCrypto Week.‚Äù Chairman Hill called the move a ‚Äúhistoric step‚Äù to ensure that the United States remains the world‚Äôs leader in the crypto landscape. ‚ÄúWe are advancing landmark legislation to establish a clear regulatory framework for digital assets that safeguards customers and investors,‚Äù he added.Additionally, Senator Cynthia Lummis lauded the effort of Congress to capitalize on Trump‚Äôs friendly stance on digital assets. ‚ÄúFor the first time in US history, we have a president who sees the value in embracing digital assets,‚Äù she stated.

title: Chinese Tech Giants Alibaba and JD.com Urge Central Bank Approval for Yuan-Based Stablecoins
body: Chinese tech giants JD[dot]com and Alibaba affiliate Ant Group are pressuring the People‚Äôs Bank of China to authorize yuan-based stablecoins. The companies are proposing to launch an offshore yuan in Hong Kong to counter the U.S. dollar‚Äôs dominance in digital payments and accelerate the yuan‚Äôs internationalization, according to Reuters . The lobbying effort comes as Hong Kong‚Äôs comprehensive stablecoin regulations take effect August 1, 2025 , establishing one of the world‚Äôs most rigorous frameworks for digital currency issuance. Hong Kong‚Äôs new stablecoin regulations will take effect on August 1, introducing a strict licensing regime and reserve requirements for issuers. #HongKong #StablecoinRegulations https://t.co/Dq6UAZsKl1 ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) June 6, 2025 Both companies already plan to issue Hong Kong dollar-backed stablecoins, but argue that offshore yuan tokens are urgently needed as strategic tools for cross-border commerce. Yuan Devaluation At Risk If US Dollar Stablecoins Dominate According to Reuters, over 99% of the $247 billion global stablecoin market remains U.S. dollar-denominated. The yuan‚Äôs share of global payments dropped to 2.89% in May, its lowest in nearly two years, while the dollar commands 48.46% market share through SWIFT payment systems. ‚Äú The global expansion of U.S. dollar stablecoins is posing fresh challenges to yuan internationalisation ,‚Äù said Wang Yongli, former vice head of Bank of China and co-chairman of Digital China Information Service Group. The push is a shift from China‚Äôs 2021 crypto ban, which is strategic, as it came at a time when Standard Chartered Bank projects the global stablecoin market could reach $2 trillion by 2028, driven by anticipated U.S. regulatory explicit clarity and institutional adoption. Hong Kong Emerges as Digital Currency Testing Ground Hong Kong‚Äôs stablecoin framework requires full reserve backing with high-quality liquid assets, segregated from the issuer‚Äôs funds and protected from creditor claims. The minimum capital requirements are HKD 25 million or 1% of the total issuance, whichever is greater. Redemption at par within one business day is required under normal conditions. Previously, JD.com‚Äôs subsidiary, Jingdong Coinlink Technology, entered the Hong Kong Monetary Authority‚Äôs stablecoin sandbox alongside Standard Chartered, Animoca Brands, and Hong Kong Telecommunications. @JD_Corporate is testing a fiat-pegged stablecoin in Hong Kong‚Äôs regulatory sandbox for cross-border payments and retail use. #stablecoin #hongkong https://t.co/WlxEcenrfl ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) May 30, 2025 The company completed second-phase testing for its blockchain-based stablecoin, pegged 1:1 to fiat currencies, including the Hong Kong dollar and the U.S. dollar. Similarly, Ant Group‚Äôs Singapore-based international unit also plans to file for Hong Kong stablecoin licenses immediately after August 1 regulations take effect. The company is also pursuing licenses in Singapore and Luxembourg, anchoring its digital currency ambitions in key global financial hubs. This stablecoin regulation clarity is particularly crucial as Hong Kong banks processed HK$17.2 billion ($2.19 billion) in digital asset transactions during 2024 , with HK$5.1 billion ($649.7 million) under custody by year-end. Ten digital asset trading platforms have secured licenses, with eight more applications under review by the Securities and Futures Commission. Source: SFC Hong Kong Additionally, VMS Group, managing nearly $4 billion for Hong Kong‚Äôs wealthiest families, allocated $10 million to Re7 Capital‚Äôs decentralized finance strategies . These strategic moves are painting a picture of growing institutional adoption of regulated digital asset exposure in Hong Kong and China as a whole. Strategic Push Against Dollar Dominance Intensifies Chinese exporters are increasingly using dollar-pegged stablecoins as overseas merchants send payments in USDT, according to HashKey chairman Xiao Feng. Capital controls, geopolitical tensions, and currency volatility in emerging markets have spurred this shift among Chinese businesses. In fact, Crypto HK, Hong Kong‚Äôs largest crypto OTC exchange, reports a five-fold growth in monthly USDT trading volume by Chinese clients for trade settlement since 2021, as Reuters reported. The trend further shows the growing adoption of dollar stablecoins for cross-border commerce, despite China‚Äôs domestic crypto restrictions. JD.com proposed that China allow yuan stablecoin issuance in Hong Kong before expanding pilots to offshore markets within China‚Äôs free trade zones. The company argued that Hong Kong dollar stablecoins fail to promote yuan usage since they‚Äôre pegged to U.S. dollars. Recognizing the challenges that dollar stablecoins pose to Chinese financial regulation, many high officials are considering ‚Äúa possibility‚Äù for a yuan-pegged stablecoin. President Donald Trump‚Äôs support for stablecoins following his January inauguration has particularly accelerated the development of the U.S. regulatory framework. The timing adds urgency to China‚Äôs considerations as the GENUIS Act is close to legitimizing dollar-pegged cryptocurrencies. As it stands now, Beijing is evaluating strategic responses to maintain monetary sovereignty amid the growing threat of the dollar‚Äôs dominance. The post Chinese Tech Giants Alibaba and JD.com Urge Central Bank Approval for Yuan-Based Stablecoins appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Former U.S. Treasurer Just Made a Shocking Confirmation about XRP
body: In a tweet shared by crypto influencer XRP Governor, Rosie Rios, the 43rd Treasurer of the United States, was shown expressing strong support for Ripple and XRP . According to XRP Governor‚Äôs statement, Rios confirmed she joined Ripple ‚Äúspecifically because of XRP,‚Äù and emphasized, ‚ÄúThe government will follow.‚Äù In the video captioned in the tweet, Rios remarks on the strategic importance of blockchain technology and the XRP Ledger in reshaping the future of finance. The tweet asserted that her words go beyond speculation, describing the current developments as a ‚Äúblueprint‚Äù for what is coming. XRP Governor concluded the post by suggesting that the XRP Ledger is evolving into a next-generation global financial system, with a pointed remark that the ‚Äúnext 12 hours‚Äù should be expected to bring significant activity, described by the influencer as ‚Äúfireworks.‚Äù BREAKING: Rosie Rios, former U.S. Treasurer, just confirmed she joined Ripple specifically because of #XRP , and declared: ‚ÄúThe government will follow.‚Äù This isn't speculation. It's a blueprint. The XRP Ledger is becoming the next-gen global financial system. The next 12‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/um5Zvfh8eB ‚Äî XRP Governor (@xrpgovernor) July 2, 2025 Rosie Rios Explains Her Reasons for Joining Ripple‚Äôs Board In the video attached to the tweet, Rosie Rios outlined her rationale for becoming a member of Ripple‚Äôs board. She directly addressed the frequent question of why she joined the company and responded by saying, ‚ÄúI joined the board of Ripple because XRP serves a purpose.‚Äù She clarified that XRP facilitates cross-border payments and differentiated it from digital assets that serve as arbitrary stores of value. She stated that XRP ‚Äúis not some store of value kind of arbitrary value that is not pegged to anything.‚Äù Rios explained that XRP has a clear and defined utility within the financial sector, particularly in the area of international payments. ‚ÄúThis is actually what legitimate financial institutions use specifically for cross-border payments,‚Äù she said. Rios described the innovation as transforming transactions from being measured in ‚Äúdays and dollars‚Äù to ‚Äúseconds and cents,‚Äù which she described as the direction the financial world is moving toward. Blockchain, Government, and Institutional Lag During her remarks, Rios emphasized that blockchain and Bitcoin are here to stay. She noted that innovation often outpaces regulatory and governmental frameworks, attributing this lag to a lack of subject-matter experts within government institutions. ‚ÄúThe unfortunate part about government traditionally is it doesn‚Äôt lead, it follows,‚Äù she said. She acknowledged the efforts of the current U.S. administration to address this gap by forming task forces and bringing expertise from the private sector into public discussions. Rios highlighted the missed opportunities of the last decade but suggested that momentum is now building, with increased regulatory clarity emerging. She suggested that, for the first time, there is a genuine convergence between regulatory interest and technological innovation. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Emphasis on XRP‚Äôs Real-World Application Reiterating the practical application of XRP, Rios says it facilitates real-world financial transactions, not merely as a speculative asset. She indicated that XRP is being utilized by serious financial players and institutions, stating it serves a ‚Äúfunction that facilitates cross-border payments.‚Äù Her comments underscored that XRP has a clear use case grounded in improving legacy financial processes, offering a faster and more cost-effective solution. She also alluded to the regulatory green light that may happen soon, emphasizing that the landscape is shifting. ‚ÄúYou know what four months make in terms of giving that green light for innovation to actually happen?‚Äù she asked rhetorically, suggesting that significant regulatory or institutional developments are imminent. The tweet by XRP Governor highlighted Rosie Rios‚Äôs public reaffirmation of her position on Ripple and XRP. Her perspective on the broader evolution of blockchain integration into global finance. Rios, leveraging her former role as U.S. Treasurer, framed XRP as an essential and functional component of financial modernization, not merely a digital asset among many. Her commentary stressed the accelerating pace of institutional adoption and regulatory engagement, positioning XRP and the XRP Ledger as key components in the next phase of financial system transformation. title: Ripple Unleashes Another 500 Million XRP. Here‚Äôs What Just Happened
body: Ripple has released another 500 million XRP, worth approximately $1.12 billion, from escrow, according to blockchain tracker Whale Alert. The transaction, executed on July 4, 2025, raises fresh speculation about Ripple‚Äôs evolving escrow strategy. A Follow-Up to the July 1 Release This latest release comes just days after Ripple‚Äôs July 1 escrow operation, where the company unlocked 500 million XRP but promptly relocked 400 million XRP , leaving only 100 million XRP in circulation. That earlier move signaled a more conservative approach aimed at managing liquidity without oversaturating the market. 500,000,000 #XRP (1,118,938,031 USD) unlocked from escrow at unknown wallet https://t.co/5jBpd4IqV1 ‚Äî Whale Alert (@whale_alert) July 4, 2025 Unlike the July 1 transaction, today‚Äôs release shows no immediate signs of relocking. All 500 million XRP remain active on the ledger, prompting speculation that Ripple may be preparing to use the funds for operational costs, On-Demand Liquidity (ODL) services, or strategic ecosystem investments. Ripple‚Äôs Escrow Mechanism Evolves Introduced in 2017, Ripple‚Äôs escrow system was designed to release 1 billion XRP tokens monthly , providing a predictable and transparent supply schedule. However, the company‚Äôs recent behavior, staggering releases, and selectively relocking large portions suggest a more flexible, market-responsive strategy is now in play. We are on twitter, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) July 15, 2023 Market Response and Investor Sentiment So far, XRP‚Äôs price has remained relatively steady following today‚Äôs release, showing no major signs of volatility. Still, market participants are watching closely. Large-scale unlocks often trigger caution among traders, but Ripple‚Äôs previous decision to relock 400 million XRP earlier this month may help ease concerns. Liquidity Management in Focus With 1 billion XRP unlocked in July and 400 million already returned to escrow, Ripple‚Äôs actions reflect a careful effort to balance supply with ecosystem demand. Whether this latest release will be partially relocked or fully deployed remains to be seen, but one thing is clear: Ripple‚Äôs dynamic approach to liquidity management is reshaping how XRP supply enters the market. title: Binance Launches Institutional Loans With Up to 4x Leverage, Zero Interest Offers
body: Binance has unveiled Institutional Loans, a new cross-collateralized credit line offering verified corporate clients up to 4x leverage by borrowing against multiple accounts without the need to consolidate assets. Key Takeaways: Binance Institutional Loans let corporate clients borrow with up to 4x leverage. Borrowed funds are instantly deployed to dedicated margin accounts. Binance supports over 400 collateral assets and offers 0% interest opportunities. The product aims to boost capital efficiency for high-frequency and institutional traders who need rapid access to liquidity, the exchange said on Thursday . Unlike standard margin products tied to a single account, Institutional Loans let traders pool collateral from up to ten Spot, Cross Margin, and Portfolio Margin sub-accounts. Binance Loans Enable Instant Margin Access via Dedicated Accounts Borrowed funds are credited to a dedicated Portfolio Margin, Portfolio Margin Pro, or Cross Margin account, enabling instant deployment across Binance‚Äôs Margin and Futures markets. Borrowers can access loans between 1 to 10 million USDC or USDT, secured against net equity across their collateralized accounts. Binance‚Äôs program supports over 400 collateral assets, with major Spot tokens like BTC, ETH, USDT, USDC, SOL, and BNB exempt from haircut ratios, giving clients greater borrowing power. An interest rebate program is also available, offering a path to 0% financing if performance criteria are met. To qualify, firms must complete corporate verification and meet VIP 5 trading volume thresholds or undergo a manual assessment. Once approved, they can pledge collateral, monitor loan-to-value ratios, and immediately deploy borrowed assets with spot-like latency. Introducing #Binance Institutional Loans. A cross-collateralized credit line offering up to 4x leverage across accounts to maximize capital efficiency, with interest rates that can be reduced to zero through an interest rebate program. Learn more https://t.co/zUjwy3GzM4 ‚Äî Binance VIP & Institutional (@BinanceVIP) July 3, 2025 ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre continuously enhancing our offerings for institutional clients,‚Äù Binance CEO Richart Teng wrote in a recent post on X . ‚ÄúBinance Institutional Loans doesn‚Äôt just offer credit, it reimagines how institutions access liquidity across their entire portfolio,‚Äù he added. As reported, Binance continues to demonstrate its appeal to large market participants through Bitcoin inflows. On May 22, when Bitcoin surged to an all-time high of $112,000, the average Bitcoin deposit to Binance spiked to 7 BTC, the highest among all exchanges. For comparison, Bitfinex saw an average of 5 BTC, while OKX, Kraken, and Coinbase recorded lower figures ‚Äî 1.23, 0.7, and 0.8 BTC, respectively. These numbers suggest Binance is the preferred venue for whales and high-volume traders. Binance Unveils AI-Powered Customizable Interface Last month, Binance launched ‚ÄúBinance UI Refined,‚Äù a new app interface offering AI-powered customization that lets its 275 million users tailor their trading homepages with drag-and-drop widgets suited to their experience level and regional preferences. The redesign, announced ahead of Binance‚Äôs eighth anniversary, aims to break away from a one-size-fits-all approach. New features include AI widgets like the Trending Widget, which scans posts from X and Binance Square to highlight coins gaining social media traction, alongside real-time sentiment analysis. Other widgets let users monitor spot and futures assets, track ETF flows, follow lead traders, and access yield products. Meanwhile, Binance is also expanding into newly reopened markets. After the U.S. Treasury eased sanctions on Syria through General License 25, Binance quickly reinstated full access to its platform for Syrian residents . The post Binance Launches Institutional Loans With Up to 4x Leverage, Zero Interest Offers appeared first on Cryptonews .

Month Potential Low Potential Average Potential High HBAR Price Prediction July 2025 $0.072 $0.191 $0.270 Hedera Price Projection 2025 Hedera experienced a volatile H1 2025. After peaking at $0.40 in mid-January, the HBAR price began a steady decline. External factors and waning investor engagement, evident in the Total Value Locked (TVL), pushed it into a converging falling wedge pattern, ultimately hitting a low of $0.125 in early April. However, the tide began to turn in the second week of April. A broader crypto rally provided a much-needed lift for HBAR. It broke free from the wedge, bouncing off a robust support zone that had previously fueled a rally in Q4 2024. This zone, validated by the Fixed Range Volume Profile (FRVP) indicator, indicated strong buying interest and set the stage for a sharp rebound. In a remarkable surge, HBAR climbed nearly 80%, rising from $0.125 to $0.228 between April and mid-May. Unfortunately, this momentum was short-lived. As geopolitical tensions escalated in mid-May, HBAR‚Äôs price retreated back to its April lows, forming a parallel declining wedge. As of the first week of July, HBAR is trading near its upper boundary. This movement follows a boost from the ceasefire announcement in late June, inching closer to the $0.191 resistance level. If the bulls regain strength and achieve a daily close above this mark, HBAR could potentially retest the $0.23 and $0.27 resistance levels in July or the coming months. Looking ahead, a daily close above $0.27 in Q3 or Q4 could pave the way for a return to $0.40. If the momentum persists, HBAR might even reach $0.75 by year-end. On the downside, failing to maintain multi-month support and facing rejection from the 200-day EMA could see the price drop toward $0.072. Despite the muted price movement, Hedera‚Äôs internal developments tell a more promising story. The ecosystem continues to expand. In 2025, Hedera launched its first native hardware wallet, Citadel , along with an AI-based tool called the Hedera Agent Kit , which simplifies token creation. Another significant project, HashSphere, is set to launch in Q3 2025. This initiative aims to provide a private, regulated blockchain for stablecoin-based payments and asset management. Additionally, Hedera underwent a rebranding on May 15, with the HBAR Foundation now known as the ‚ÄúHedera Foundation‚Äù and the Governing Council rebranded as the ‚ÄúHedera Council.‚Äù This restructuring positions Hedera for a stronger future, signaling maturity within its ecosystem. In summary, while external pressures weigh on HBAR‚Äôs price, the internal progress of Hedera remains robust. title: Bitcoin is deep into its bull run, here‚Äôs what comes next: analyst
body: Bitcoin may be entering the final phase of its current bull cycle, with a potential market peak just months away, according to market analyst Rekt Capital. In a recent breakdown , the Bitcoin ( BTC ) analyst compared the current market structure to past halving cycles, using historical timeframes to estimate where Bitcoin stands. His analysis is based on a model where Bitcoin typically peaks between 518 and 550 days after halving, a pattern seen in both the 2016 and 2020 cycles. According to Rekt Capital, the market is roughly 88% through the typical post-halving period, now entering the later stages of the cycle. If the same trend holds, the next cycle top could fall within late September and mid-October 2025. #BTC Bull Market Progress: ‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñì‚ñë‚ñë 88.0% (Progress will speed up on Parabolic advances) $BTC #Crypto #Bitcoin pic.twitter.com/GPwGPR7Cz5 ‚Äî Rekt Capital (@rektcapital) July 1, 2025 While some market participants may expect the current cycle to stretch into 2026, Rekt Capital cautioned against extending expectations too far beyond historical patterns, saying that doing so could lead investors to miss the window of opportunity. One of the defining features of this cycle, according to Rekt Capital, is the longest post-halving reaccumulation period in Bitcoin‚Äôs history. For eight months after the April 2024 halving, BTC remained in a period of consolidation. You might also like: Bitcoin breaks through $107,000, is the stagnant period over? According to the analyst, this was necessary to offset the strong pre-halving upside that pushed the asset‚Äôs price significantly ahead of schedule and realign the cycle with historical trends. What comes next? With the crypto king still consolidating just below its all-time high, Rekt Capital explained that similar phases of slowing momentum or ‚Äúprice discovery corrections‚Äù occurred at this stage in both the 2017 and 2021 cycles. These periods often gave way to renewed momentum leading into the final phase of the bull market. However, he emphasized that as the cycle matures, the risk-to-reward ratio begins to shift. While some upside may remain, the scale of potential gains becomes smaller compared to the downside risk of a full-cycle correction. Rekt Capital cited historical drawdowns of 60‚Äì70% that followed prior bull market tops, underscoring the importance of managing risk and preparing for volatility. Rekt Capital also addressed the idea of cycle extensions, noting that while the current cycle could stretch slightly, as past ones have by around 30 days, using those assumptions to delay profit-taking carries risk. ‚ÄúThe danger here is if we‚Äôre going to keep moving the goalpost, at some point we‚Äôre going to miss that bull market top,‚Äù he said. With that in mind, the analyst suggested sticking to past patterns, and that anything beyond the historical window should be treated as ‚Äúbonus time‚Äù rather than a guarantee of further upside. The focus for investors, he said, should now shift toward preparing for that window, protecting gains, and not getting distracted by newer cycle narratives that lack historical backing. BTC has been in a steady climb over the past week, trading slightly over $108,840 at press time. Read more: Bitcoin investors sit on $1.2 trillion in profits as HODLing dominates: Glassnode

title: Will FTX Claims Include Countries Where Cryptocurrency Activities Are Restricted or Banned?
body: Chinese users among other listed nations could see their FTX claims tied up longer or even wiped out. The FTX Recovery Trust is seeking legal opinion to facilitate claim distributions. FTX held the majority of its assets in Solana, Bitcoin, and Ethereum for global users. FTX Recovery Trust has filed a motion in Delaware‚Äôs bankruptcy court to establish a process for handling claims from 49 countries where cryptocurrency trading is banned or illegal. The FTX Recovery Trust will consider the claims from the said nations as disputed claims. Out of the 49 countries listed by FTX Recovery Trust, creditors from China accounted for 82% of the disputed claims, which is estimated at 5% of the total allowed claims. If these disputed claims are denied, the forfeited amount will impact the final distribution pool. 1) FTX will take a legal opinion 2) If can make distributions to potentially Restricted Foreign Jurisdictions will do so 3) if it determines resident is of Restricted Foreign Jurisdiction i) Claim will be disputed ii) File an objection iii) Will forfeit distribution‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/9aNbF63zwa ‚Äî Sunil (FTX Creditor Champion) (@sunil_trades) July 3, 202‚Ä¶ The post Will FTX Claims Include Countries Where Cryptocurrency Activities Are Restricted or Banned? appeared first on Coin Edition .

title: Nano Labs Begins BNB Accumulation with $50M Purchase
body: Chinese microchip manufacturer Nano Labs has officially started its ambitious plan to build a major treasury of BNB , the native token of Binance. On Thursday, the company confirmed it had acquired $50 million worth of BNB, marking the first step toward its goal of holding between 5% and 10% of BNB‚Äôs total circulating supply. Nano Labs reiterated its long-term target of spending up to $1 billion on BNB, with its latest purchase bringing its combined crypto holdings, including Bitcoin, to approximately $160 million. Founded in 2019 by Kong Jianping and Sun Qifeng following their tenure at hardware giant Canaan, Nano Labs went public in 2022 and specializes in high-performance computing chips and high-throughput computing solutions. While the company‚Äôs initial announcement to issue $500 million in convertible notes for its BNB treasury previously sent its stock soaring by over 106%, the latest purchase failed to generate similar enthusiasm. Nano Labs Aiming for 10% BNB Supply With BNB‚Äôs circulating supply at 145.8 million and a market capitalization of $93.4 billion, acquiring 10% at market rates would require around $926 million in additional purchases from Nano Labs. Binance‚Äôs ongoing token burns have steadily reduced BNB‚Äôs circulating supply, with Binance and its former CEO Changpeng ‚ÄúCZ‚Äù Zhao reportedly holding a combined 71% of the circulating supply, according to a June 2024 Forbes report. A BNB Chain spokesperson acknowledged the increased institutional interest in BNB, stating, ‚ÄúWe welcome all organic adoption that supports BNB and the sustainable growth of our ecosystem.‚Äù Crypto Treasuries Face Investor Scrutiny Despite a broader trend of companies adding crypto to their treasuries , some industry figures remain skeptical about the long-term appeal. Anthony Scaramucci, founder of SkyBridge Capital, told Bloomberg that while he remains bullish on Bitcoin, investors may question whether it makes sense to back a company holding crypto instead of purchasing the asset directly. ‚ÄúThe question is, if you‚Äôre giving somebody $10 and they‚Äôre putting $8 into Bitcoin, are they going to do well? Yes. But you might have been better off just putting $10 into Bitcoin,‚Äù Scaramucci said, emphasizing that investors must carefully evaluate the underlying costs tied to crypto treasury strategies. The post Nano Labs Begins BNB Accumulation with $50M Purchase appeared first on TheCoinrise.com .

title: Revolutionary Google Veo 3: Unleashing Advanced AI Video Generation Globally
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Google Veo 3: Unleashing Advanced AI Video Generation Globally In the rapidly evolving landscape where artificial intelligence intersects with creative industries, a significant development has just landed. For those closely watching the advancements in AI, especially how it reshapes digital content and potentially impacts decentralized platforms or the broader digital economy, Google‚Äôs latest move is nothing short of groundbreaking. The tech giant has officially commenced the global rollout of its new Google Veo 3 video generation model, making powerful AI-driven video creation accessible to a wider audience. This isn‚Äôt just another incremental update; it signifies a major leap in how we conceive and produce video content, with potential ripple effects across various sectors, including those exploring web3 and creator economies. Revolutionizing Content Creation with Google Veo 3: What‚Äôs the Big Deal? On July 3, 2025, Google announced a pivotal moment for creators and businesses worldwide: the global expansion of its Google Veo 3 video generation model. This sophisticated AI tool, first showcased in May, is now available to Gemini users across more than 159 countries. What makes this rollout particularly noteworthy is its potential to democratize high-quality video production, previously a domain requiring extensive technical skills and resources. Imagine transforming simple text prompts into compelling video clips ‚Äì that‚Äôs the core promise of Veo 3. This isn‚Äôt a free-for-all, however. Access to Veo 3‚Äôs advanced capabilities is exclusively for paying subscribers of Google‚Äôs AI Pro plan. While this ensures a certain level of commitment from users and likely helps manage computational resources, it also establishes a clear value proposition for Google‚Äôs premium AI offerings. Currently, users are capped at generating three videos per day, with each video clip lasting up to eight seconds. This initial limitation, while perhaps restrictive for large-scale projects, is a strategic move, allowing Google to scale its infrastructure and refine the model based on real-world usage and feedback. The immediate implications for content creators are immense. From marketers needing quick promotional snippets to educators creating engaging learning materials, Veo 3 offers a rapid prototyping tool for visual narratives. Its ability to generate video from text prompts means that ideas can be visualized almost instantly, reducing the time and cost associated with traditional video production pipelines. This efficiency can translate into faster campaign cycles, more dynamic educational content, and ultimately, a richer digital experience for consumers. As the digital economy increasingly relies on engaging visual content, tools like Veo 3 become indispensable assets. The Power of Video Generation AI: How Does Veo 3 Work? At its heart, video generation AI like Veo 3 leverages deep learning models trained on vast datasets of video and text. This training enables the AI to understand the nuances of language and translate them into visual sequences, complete with appropriate pacing, transitions, and visual styles. Users simply input a descriptive text prompt ‚Äì for instance, ‚Äúa golden retriever running through a field of sunflowers at sunset‚Äù ‚Äì and Veo 3 processes this instruction to render a corresponding video clip. The magic lies in the AI‚Äôs ability to interpret context and generate coherent, visually appealing footage that aligns with the user‚Äôs intent. While the current version focuses on text-to-video, Google‚Äôs Josh Woodward has hinted at future enhancements, including the highly anticipated image-to-video generation capabilities. This would allow users to provide a still image and have the AI animate it or generate a video based on its visual elements, opening up even more creative avenues. Consider the benefits this brings: Speed and Efficiency: Dramatically cuts down the time required to produce short video content. Accessibility: Lowers the barrier to entry for video creation, empowering individuals and small businesses without large budgets or specialized skills. Prototyping: Enables rapid iteration and visualization of concepts, speeding up creative workflows. Innovation: Opens up new forms of storytelling and content experiences previously unimaginable. This leap in video generation AI is not just about convenience; it‚Äôs about fundamentally altering the economics and logistics of digital content production. For industries that thrive on visual communication, such as entertainment, advertising, and even news media, Veo 3 represents a powerful new tool that could reshape their operational strategies and creative output. Accessing Advanced Capabilities through Gemini AI: What‚Äôs the Catch? The integration of Veo 3 with Google‚Äôs flagship Gemini AI platform is a strategic move that centralizes Google‚Äôs advanced AI offerings. By making Veo 3 available to Gemini AI Pro subscribers, Google is clearly positioning Gemini as the go-to hub for its most cutting-edge artificial intelligence tools. This tiered access model ensures that users who are most invested in Google‚Äôs AI ecosystem receive priority access to these powerful new features. The subscription model for Gemini AI Pro allows Google to manage the immense computational resources required to run such complex models. Generating high-quality video is resource-intensive, and a paid tier helps ensure service stability and performance for committed users. While the daily cap of three videos might seem restrictive, it‚Äôs a common strategy for new, high-demand AI services to prevent overload and ensure fair usage as the technology scales. For those already leveraging Gemini for other AI-driven tasks, the addition of Veo 3 makes the AI Pro subscription even more compelling. It creates a comprehensive suite where users can move seamlessly from text generation and code assistance to visual content creation, all within the same powerful AI framework. This unified experience is a significant advantage, streamlining workflows and enhancing productivity for professionals across various domains. Moreover, the integration with Gemini hints at future possibilities where Veo 3 could interact with other Gemini capabilities. Imagine using Gemini to brainstorm video concepts, generate scripts, and then instantly create the corresponding video clips, all within a single AI-powered environment. This synergy could unlock unprecedented levels of creative efficiency and redefine the boundaries of what‚Äôs possible with AI assistance. Understanding the Evolution of AI Models: A Broader Perspective The rollout of Veo 3 is not an isolated event but part of a larger, accelerated trend in the development and deployment of sophisticated AI models . Google, alongside other tech giants, has been consistently pushing the boundaries of what artificial intelligence can achieve. From understanding complex language to generating realistic images and now dynamic videos, the capabilities of these models are expanding at an exponential rate. Recent developments underscore this rapid evolution: AI in Education: Google has embraced AI in the classroom, introducing new Gemini tools for educators and chatbots for students. This signifies a move towards integrating AI into fundamental learning processes. Enhanced Search: Google Photos now merges classic search with AI to speed up results, demonstrating how AI is improving everyday user experiences. Robotics Integration: Google recently rolled out a new Gemini model capable of running on robots locally, showcasing AI‚Äôs expansion into physical automation and real-world interaction. These diverse applications highlight the versatility and increasing sophistication of modern AI models . Veo 3 is a testament to the advancements in multimodal AI, where models are trained to process and generate different types of data ‚Äì in this case, text inputs into video outputs. This ability to bridge different data modalities is crucial for creating more intuitive and powerful AI systems that can understand and interact with the world in a more human-like way. The competitive landscape in AI development is intense, with companies vying to release the most capable and versatile models. This competition drives innovation, leading to faster progress and more powerful tools for users. However, it also raises important questions about ethical deployment, bias in training data, and the responsible use of such powerful technology. Google, like others, faces the challenge of balancing innovation with responsible AI development. The Future of Generative AI: Beyond Video and into New Frontiers The launch of Veo 3 serves as a powerful indicator of the trajectory of generative AI . This field, focused on creating new content rather than just analyzing existing data, is rapidly transforming industries. While video generation is a major milestone, the principles behind Veo 3 can be extended to countless other applications, from creating realistic virtual environments for gaming and simulations to designing new products and materials. The impact of generative AI is already being felt across various sectors: Creative Industries: Revolutionizing film, music, art, and design by automating tedious tasks and empowering creators with new tools. Marketing and Advertising: Enabling personalized content at scale, from tailored ad campaigns to dynamic product showcases. Research and Development: Accelerating discovery in fields like medicine and materials science by generating novel molecular structures or experimental designs. Virtual Worlds: Building immersive metaverse experiences with dynamically generated landscapes, characters, and narratives. However, the rapid advancement of generative AI also presents significant challenges. Ethical considerations, such as deepfakes and the potential for misuse, are paramount. There are also ongoing discussions about intellectual property rights when AI generates content based on existing works. Furthermore, the sheer computational power required for training and running these models raises concerns about energy consumption and environmental impact. As we look ahead, the future of generative AI promises even more integrated and intuitive tools. We might see AI models that can generate entire multimedia presentations from a single prompt, or even create interactive experiences that adapt in real-time to user input. The potential for these technologies to augment human creativity and productivity is immense, but navigating the associated challenges will require careful consideration and collaborative efforts from technologists, policymakers, and society at large. A New Era of Digital Creation The global rollout of Google Veo 3 marks a significant moment in the evolution of artificial intelligence and its practical applications. By bringing advanced video generation AI to a global audience through its Gemini AI Pro plan, Google is not just offering a new tool; it‚Äôs catalyzing a shift in how digital content is conceived and produced. This move underscores the rapid advancements in AI models and their increasing capability to handle complex creative tasks. As generative AI continues its relentless march forward, tools like Veo 3 will become integral to the creative workflow, empowering individuals and organizations to tell their stories more effectively and efficiently than ever before. While challenges remain, the promise of a more accessible and dynamic digital creative landscape is now closer to reality. To learn more about the latest AI models trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features. This post Revolutionary Google Veo 3: Unleashing Advanced AI Video Generation Globally first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Hong Kong eyes crypto gains as Singapore clamps down
body: Hong Kong stands positioned to get hold of crypto liquidity as Singapore tightens regulations on unlicensed cryptocurrency companies. The Monetary Authority of Singapore‚Äôs June 30 deadline for crypto service providers to stop offering digital token services to overseas markets creates opportunities for Hong Kong‚Äôs regulated crypto ecosystem to attract quality projects seeking compliant operations. Singapore‚Äôs regulatory crackdown creates market opportunities Singapore‚Äôs central bank has taken drastic steps mandating cryptocurrency companies registered in the city to obtain proper licensing or shut shop. The Monetary Authority of Singapore asked crypto companies providing services globally to adhere to new rules. They also gave a stern June 30 deadline for digital token service providers to suspend overseas market operations. This increased regulation is part of a broader Asian movement toward tougher crypto regulation. Thailand recently moved to ban five crypto exchanges, including industry giants OKX and Bybit, and Dubai‚Äôs Virtual Asset Regulatory Authority updated its guidelines to strengthen investor protections across the country. The move shows what analysts describe as a region-wide approach to regulatory compliance, with jurisdictions seeking to align with Financial Action Task Force standards. Countries across Asia are implementing measures to eliminate bad actors from the cryptocurrency industry while establishing frameworks for legitimate operations. Despite the regulatory pressure, some crypto exchanges plan to maintain certain operations in Singapore. Bloomberg reported that Binance, the world‚Äôs largest crypto exchange, expects minimal impact from the new rules and could retain hundreds of employees in the city . However, other major exchanges including Bitget and Bybit are reportedly planning to shift operations to Dubai and Hong Kong. Hong Kong strengthens digital asset framework Hong Kong has developed a sound virtual asset regulatory regime, and the operations of crypto trading platforms are now required to apply for a license since 2023. The regulatory approach of the jurisdiction is to build a regulated ecosystem that invites legitimate crypto participants under stringent compliance conditions. The Legislative Council on 21 May 2025 passed the adoption of the Stablecoin Ordinance, and the legislation took effect from 1 August. The legislation introduces a licensing regime for the issuers of fiat-backed stablecoins with the Hong Kong Monetary Authority. The licensed issuers should have fully backed reserve assets, provide straightforward at-par value redemptions, and possess effective anti-money laundering controls. The ordinance mandates segregation of client funds and prohibits unlicensed sale and issue to retail investors. These steps align Hong Kong‚Äôs stablecoin regime with global best practices and provide compliant participants with scope to establish regional headquarters. Beijing‚Äôs intentions to sell on auction cryptocurrencies seized from Hong Kong investors can provide liquidity to the jurisdiction‚Äôs digital asset markets. The news, combined with the recent stablecoin regulations, makes Hong Kong a likely beneficiary of regional regulatory shifts. Yet Hong Kong‚Äôs crypto ambitions are still hampered by mainland China‚Äôs broader cryptocurrency crackdown. While China bans cryptocurrency trading outright, it may consider Hong Kong a regulated pilot zone for digital asset activity within approved limits. Regional competition for compliant crypto operations Hong Kong has limitations and opportunities alike as it competes for Asia‚Äôs crypto market share. According to legal experts, although the jurisdiction is leveraging Singapore‚Äôs regulatory squeeze, it will not automatically open doors for all crypto businesses looking for new headquarters. The territory‚Äôs strategy is to bring in high-quality projects with high compliance standards and not regulatory arbitrage. The experts recommend Hong Kong implement more liberal virtual asset legislation in order to take advantage of the prevailing market trends. By developing a visionary regulatory environment, the territory will be in a better place to attract more investment while maintaining competitive terrain worldwide. The jurisdiction‚Äôs potential as a Web3 hub remains subject to the mainland China government‚Äôs willingness to embrace digital asset activity. Although China completely prohibits cryptocurrency trading, it may take Hong Kong as a stand-alone test bed for blockchain technology within tolerable proportions. Market observers note that harmonization of regulation across jurisdictions reduces the appeal of regulatory arbitrage to cryptocurrency firms. The focus is thus on having compliant, liquid digital asset markets rather than seeking jurisdictions with light regulation. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? title: XRP charts bullish reversal pattern as analyst eyes breakout to $2.65
body: XRP is showing signs of a potential breakout after forming an inverse head and shoulders pattern on the 4-hour chart, a classic technical signal that often precedes upward price movements. According to leading chart analyst Ali Martinez : ‚ÄúXRP appears to be forming an inverse head and shoulders pattern, potentially setting the stage for a 15% breakout to $2.65.‚Äù At the time of writing, XRP is trading around $2.22, hovering just below the neckline resistance at $2.33. XRP analysts chart. Source: Ali Martinez The setup, clearly visible in recent price action, includes a left shoulder formed in mid-June, a deeper head that developed in the final week of the month, and a right shoulder now in the making. A breakout above the neckline with strong volume would confirm the pattern and open the door to Martinez‚Äôs upside target. XRP price analysis Momentum indicators such as RSI are leaning bullish, and volume has been ticking higher during recent upward moves, both supportive of a potential breakout. Key Fibonacci extension levels also suggest the next resistance zones lie at $2.47, $2.54, and the full breakout target of $2.65. This bullish formation comes as the token continues to benefit from positive headlines. Ripple‚Äôs recent application for a U.S. national banking license and growing speculation around the approval of an XRP ETF have reinforced investor confidence. If bulls manage to push XRP above $2.33 with conviction, it could mark the beginning of a fresh rally. However, failure to break through may lead to a retest of the $2.08‚Äì$2.12 support zone. The post XRP charts bullish reversal pattern as analyst eyes breakout to $2.65 appeared first on Finbold .

title: xAI Data Center: Controversial Permits for 15 Natural Gas Generators Spark Environmental Debate
body: BitcoinWorld xAI Data Center: Controversial Permits for 15 Natural Gas Generators Spark Environmental Debate In the rapidly evolving landscape of artificial intelligence, the infrastructure powering these colossal computations often flies under the radar. Yet, as Elon Musk‚Äôs xAI pushes the boundaries of AI, its energy demands are now front and center, particularly concerning its burgeoning xAI data center outside Memphis. Recent developments have ignited a heated debate, raising crucial questions about sustainable growth and environmental responsibility in the tech sector. What‚Äôs the Latest on the xAI Data Center‚Äôs Energy Plans? Yesterday, county regulators in Shelby County, Tennessee, granted xAI permits to operate 15 natural gas generators at its Memphis data center. This decision comes despite significant opposition and the looming threat of a lawsuit from environmental groups. The permits allow xAI to run 15 Solar SMT-130 generators, capable of producing up to 247 megawatts of electricity. This move is pivotal for xAI, as it seeks to power its expansive AI operations, but it also casts a spotlight on the environmental implications of such massive energy consumption. The Southern Environmental Law Center (SELC) has been a vocal critic, alleging that xAI has already been operating as many as 35 generators without proper permits, with a total capacity of up to 421 megawatts. While the newly issued permit covers a portion of these, the SELC claims that eight of the same model generators were already running pre-permit, albeit with appropriate pollution controls. The legal battle appears far from over, with the NAACP prepared to sue xAI for alleged violations of the Clean Air Act, highlighting the deep-seated concerns surrounding the project. Why Are Natural Gas Generators a Point of Contention? The choice of natural gas generators for powering an advanced xAI data center is a significant point of contention due to their environmental footprint. While natural gas is often touted as a ‚Äòcleaner‚Äô fossil fuel compared to coal, its combustion still releases substantial amounts of greenhouse gases and other harmful pollutants into the atmosphere. For a company like xAI, which recently secured $10 billion in funding, the energy strategy is not just an operational decision but also a statement on its commitment to sustainability. Under the conditions of the new permit, xAI is still allowed to emit considerable amounts of pollution annually. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the permitted emissions on a rolling 12-month basis: Smog-forming NOx: 87 tons Carbon Monoxide: 94 tons Volatile Organic Compounds (VOCs): 85 tons Particulate Pollution: 73 tons Hazardous Air Pollutants (HAPs): Nearly 14 tons (including 9.8 tons of formaldehyde, a known carcinogen) These figures underscore the scale of the environmental impact, raising concerns among local communities and environmental advocates. The requirement for xAI to keep its own emissions records also prompts questions about independent oversight and transparency. What is the Environmental Impact of Such Large-Scale AI Development? The burgeoning demand for AI, from large language models to complex data processing, necessitates immense computational power, which in turn requires vast amounts of energy. This directly contributes to the broader environmental impact debate. The case of xAI in Memphis serves as a microcosm of the larger challenge facing the tech industry: how to balance rapid AI development and innovation with ecological responsibility. Community groups and environmental organizations have voiced strong concerns. Before the permit was issued, a Memphis community group offered $250,000 for an independent air quality study, demonstrating the local desire for unbiased assessment. The City of Memphis did conduct its own air quality testing in June, but the SELC raised several significant concerns about its methodology: The testing contractor did not measure ozone levels, a key component of smog. Tests were conducted on days when wind conditions likely blew xAI‚Äôs pollution away from the two closest testing sites, potentially skewing results. Testing equipment was placed directly against or in close proximity to buildings, which can interfere with accurate readings. These procedural issues highlight the complexities and distrust that can arise when environmental regulations meet industrial expansion, especially in a rapidly growing sector like AI. How Does This Affect Memphis Energy and Local Communities? The concentration of such significant energy infrastructure in one area inevitably impacts the local grid and the air quality for surrounding communities. The reliance on Memphis energy resources and the potential for increased air pollution directly affect the health and well-being of residents. This situation also brings to light past regulatory interpretations that favored inaction. Previously, the Shelby County Health Department claimed it lacked the authority to permit ‚Äòmobile‚Äô gas-burning turbines if they operated for less than 364 days, suggesting the EPA was the relevant regulator. The SELC vehemently disagreed, labeling this interpretation as ‚Äòincorrect‚Äô and ‚Äòwithout any legal analysis.‚Äô This bureaucratic back-and-forth underscores the challenges in enforcing environmental laws, especially when new technologies and large corporations are involved. The current permit approval, while seemingly a step towards regulation, still allows for substantial emissions, placing the burden of monitoring largely on xAI itself. A Look Ahead: Balancing Innovation with Responsibility The xAI situation in Memphis is a critical case study for the entire AI industry. As AI models become more complex and data centers expand, the energy footprint will only grow. The debate around natural gas generators versus renewable energy sources will intensify. Companies like xAI, while driving technological progress, face increasing scrutiny over their environmental policies. This ongoing saga emphasizes the need for robust regulatory frameworks, transparent environmental monitoring, and active community engagement to ensure that technological advancement does not come at an unacceptable cost to our planet or public health. For investors and enthusiasts in the cryptocurrency and broader tech space, understanding the energy demands and environmental implications of AI infrastructure is becoming as crucial as understanding the technology itself. The choices made today about powering these digital behemoths will shape our environmental future. To learn more about the latest AI development trends and the evolving energy landscape for AI, explore our article on key developments shaping AI infrastructure and its environmental impact. This post xAI Data Center: Controversial Permits for 15 Natural Gas Generators Spark Environmental Debate first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: MEXC Intercepts $2.2M in Illicit Crypto, Expands Risk Controls Amid Global Scrutiny
body: Crypto exchange MEXC disclosed on Thursday that it blocked $2.2 million in stolen funds and reimbursed over $559 million to derivatives traders in the past two months, according to its newly released report. The company said it processed 709 assistance requests, including 124 official freeze orders from law enforcement ‚Äî many tied to transnational cybercrime investigations. In total, 41 cases led to successfully intercepted assets. MEXC also launched a $100 million Guardian Fund aimed at covering losses from protocol-level breaches. This move aligns with a broader trend among top exchanges offering user protection mechanisms, following high-profile incidents such as the $70 million hack of a DeFi aggregator in May. The report also highlights expanded risk monitoring infrastructure, with 46,311 suspicious accounts restricted and 6,184 fraud rings identified in the CIS, India, and Southeast Asia ‚Äî regions seeing sharp rises in coordinated wallet fraud and account takeovers. Meanwhile, MEXC continues to update its Proof of Reserves (PoR) data, listing real-time wallet balances that exceed all user deposits. As of June 26, reserves included 4,083 BTC, 69,234 ETH, and 2.32 billion USDT. The release comes as the European Union finalizes MiCA implementation standards, and as multiple Asian regulators push for ‚Äúverified solvency‚Äù policies for crypto exchanges. MEXC‚Äôs transparency effort may help insulate the firm ahead of pending compliance waves. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.
