title: Bitcoin Price Prediction ‚Äì Senator Lummis Pushes Tax-Free BTC Spending Bill: Is This the First Step Toward Mass Adoption?
body: Bitcoin is trading just below $109,000 after a 29.74% second-quarter gain, its strongest Q2 since 2020. While institutional flows and corporate accumulation remain primary drivers, the latest push for crypto tax reform in Washington is adding a fresh layer of optimism for long-term adoption. U.S. Senator Cynthia Lummis recently introduced a comprehensive bill aimed at modernising how crypto is taxed. Key features include exempting transactions under $300 from capital gains tax (capped at $5,000 annually) and delaying taxation on mining or staking rewards until they‚Äôre sold. Senator Cynthia Lummis just introduced a major crypto tax reform bill after crypto-related provisions were excluded from the latest federal budget package. $300 de minimis exemption No tax on mining/staking until sold Charity & lending exclusions Aims to end double‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/d8p6qixWju ‚Äî Ethos.io (@Ethos_io) July 4, 2025 The proposal also outlines tax breaks for lending and charitable donations and allows mark-to-market accounting for crypto traders, putting digital assets on par with traditional securities. The bill, projected to generate $600 million from 2025 to 2034, could become law amid a friendlier 2025 regulatory environment. If passed, it would simplify crypto use in daily life and lower friction for retail and institutional adoption, potentially setting the stage for broader Bitcoin integration in mainstream finance. Institutions Accumulate BTC Amid ETF Inflows Institutional demand continues to fuel Bitcoin‚Äôs bullish momentum. According to SoSoValue, U.S. spot BTC ETFs attracted $769.6 million in inflows this week, marking four straight weeks of net positive flows. That consistency suggests institutional investors are building positions with a long-term view. On the corporate side, MicroStrategy expanded its holdings by acquiring 4,980 BTC, bringing its total stash to 597,325 BTC. Japan‚Äôs Metaplanet added 1,005 BTC, and Blockchain Group purchased 60 BTC‚Äîdemonstrating firm conviction in BTC as a treasury asset. Standard Chartered analyst Geoffrey Kendrick raised his year-end forecast to $200,000, citing accelerating demand and improving macroeconomic conditions. His base case for late 2025 remains $135,000, reinforcing a structurally bullish outlook. Key Institutional Activity: MicroStrategy: +4,980 BTC (597,325 total) Metaplanet: +1,005 BTC U.S. Spot ETFs: +$769.6M inflows this week Bitcoin (BTC/USD) Technical Outlook: Bulls Hold $108K Bitcoin price prediction remains bullish, as the asse t holds above a key ascending trendline drawn from the June 20 low and continues to respect support near $108,000. However, momentum has cooled after a rejection at $110,413. Bitcoin Price Chart ‚Äì Source: Tradingview The MACD has turned bearish on the 2-hour chart, suggesting a brief consolidation or pullback could follow. Key downside levels include $108,000 and $107,325, while resistance remains at $110,413 and $112,041. Technical Trade Setup: Entry: $108,000‚Äì$108,600 on bullish signal Targets: $110,413 ‚Üí $112,041 Stop: Below $107,200 MACD: Bearish crossover, awaiting price confirmation Until Bitcoin breaks below $108K, the bullish trend remains intact. Traders may look for a bounce from support to re-enter positions, especially as policy headlines and institutional activity keep sentiment elevated. Bitcoin Hyper Presale Surges Past $1.92M as Price Rise Nears Bitcoin Hyper ($HYPER) , the first Bitcoin-native Layer 2 powered by the Solana Virtual Machine (SVM), has surpassed $1.74 million in its public presale, with $1,927,122 raised out of a $2,373,526 target. The token is priced at $ 0.012125 , with the next price tier expected within hours. Designed to merge Bitcoin‚Äôs security with Solana‚Äôs speed, Bitcoin Hyper enables fast, low-cost smart contracts, dApps, and meme coin creation, all with seamless BTC bridging. The project is audited by Consult and engineered for scalability, trust, and simplicity. The golden cross of meme appeal and real utility has made Bitcoin Hyper a Layer 2 contender to watch in 2025. With staking, a streamlined presale, and full rollout expected by Q1, $HYPER is gaining serious traction. title: Famous Analyst Said Don't Believe Other Analysts, Announced the Date When the Bitcoin Bull Will End! "We Only Have a Few Months! Here's Why!"
body: As the leading cryptocurrency Bitcoin (BTC) gradually approaches its previous ATH of around $111,700, it is wondered whether it can maintain this upward momentum. At this point, some analysts state that the recent movements in BTC indicate an accumulation phase before the rise, while some analysts argue that BTC has peaked and the bull will end. One of these analysts was Rekt Capital. Rekt Capital said in its latest analysis that Bitcoin's rise and bull cycle could end within three months. The Bull May End in October! Crypto analyst Rekt Capital said that if Bitcoin follows a similar pattern to its 2020 cycle, there are only a few months left for the price to rise in the current bull cycle. The analyst noted that the current bull run could end within the next three months, with the cycle likely to peak this October. At this point, the analyst noted that if the Bitcoin cycle follows the 2020 pattern, the market will likely peak in October, 550 days after the Bitcoin halving in April 2024. ‚ÄúWe potentially have two to three months left in this bull market.‚Äù This prediction from Rekt Capital contradicts other estimates suggesting that the current bull market could extend into 2026. On this point, the analyst argued that many analysts are ignoring the halving cycle and historical patterns. ‚ÄúMany people are happy to throw away time-tested principles, but it is really important to trust such criteria. But recently, the historically more reliable halving metric has been sidelined in favor of a new narrative like Bitcoin‚Äôs correlation with the global M2 Money Supply.‚Äù *This is not investment advice. title: Best Crypto PR Agencies for Traffic Acquisition [Outset PR Introduces In-house Technique]
body: In the hyper-competitive world of crypto marketing, visibility alone isn't enough. You need targeted, converting traffic‚Äînot vanity press. While hundreds of PR agencies promise buzz, only a few deliver real acquisition outcomes. Here‚Äôs a breakdown of the top crypto PR agencies that specialize in traffic acquisition, with a spotlight on Outset PR's in-house approach. Outset PR Drives Targeted Traffic Through In-House Media Distribution Outset PR is a performance-focused crypto PR firm, prioritizing verifiable outcomes over vague visibility promises. The agency has developed proprietary in-house tools that allow it to distribute a large volume of SEO-optimized articles across media outlets known to appear in Google Top Stories and Google Discover‚Äîtwo of the most effective channels for driving organic visibility in the crypto space. Rather than chasing generic coverage, Outset PR focuses on producing content that converts. Each article is designed with user acquisition in mind, combining data-informed headlines, straightforward messaging, and placements in feeds where engaged retail and institutional audiences are active. Strategic Approach to Content and Placement Outset‚Äôs process begins with identifying the most marketable aspects of a project‚Äîwhat the firm refers to as ‚Äúclickable angles.‚Äù From there, it builds narratives that are structured to rank well in search while remaining accessible to the intended readership. Key elements of this approach include: Selection of relevant media with high visibility in Google Discover and Top Stories. Planning and writing content that supports lead generation efforts and improves the discoverability of the project. Optimizing copy for both search performance and contextual fit within the feed environment. Direct outreach and negotiation to secure placements on high-impact platforms, rather than relying solely on syndication. Verifiable Outcomes Outset‚Äôs model is designed to deliver qualified traffic rather than awareness for its own sake. Projects that have used the firm‚Äôs services‚Äîranging from meme coins to early-stage DeFi platforms‚Äîhave reported increases in presale participation and user engagement tied directly to this targeted media exposure. The firm‚Äôs integration of PR strategy with SEO, analytics, and conversion metrics reflects a broader shift in Web3 communications, as teams seek to align marketing spend with tangible growth outcomes. Explore All Services Offered by Outset PR MarketAcross: Long-Term Visibility for Established Projects MarketAcross is one of the more established names in crypto PR, with a portfolio that includes high-profile clients such as Binance, Polkadot, and eToro. The agency focuses on delivering guaranteed placements in crypto-native media through a mix of syndication and editorial relationships. Approach: Works extensively with top-tier media outlets to place SEO-aligned articles. Emphasizes content that ranks for key crypto search terms, offering long-term visibility through organic search. Best For Projects seeking consistent brand exposure, especially those with institutional backing or multi-phase rollout strategies. Coinbound: Community-Led Growth Through Media and Influencers Coinbound blends traditional media placement with a heavier emphasis on social media engagement, targeting platforms like Twitter and Discord where crypto users tend to congregate. The agency is known for integrating PR efforts with influencer campaigns to support product launches and community-building. Approach Combines press coverage with KOL activations, influencer threads, and community-led amplification. Uses retargeting strategies to extend the lifespan of PR placements through YouTube and Twitter ads. Best For Projects in NFTs, GameFi, or Web3 social sectors aiming to build active communities alongside media outreach. Luna PR: Strategic Access to Asia and MENA Markets Luna PR, headquartered in Dubai, serves as a bridge for Web3 companies entering Middle Eastern and Southeast Asian markets. The agency combines traditional public relations with investor communications and regional influencer outreach. Approach Packages media placements with regional influencer content, including Twitter Spaces and video integrations. Offers access to investor and retail audiences in the UAE, India, and surrounding markets. Best For Firms looking to build visibility in emerging markets, particularly across GCC and Asia-Pacific regions. Melrose PR: Reputation Building Through Credibility-First Media Melrose PR focuses on thought leadership and founder positioning, often targeting tier-1 business outlets and crypto-focused podcasts. The agency operates out of the U.S. and specializes in raising the professional profile of blockchain startups and infrastructure companies. Approach Places clients in mainstream business media and widely followed podcasts. Uses a mix of editorial exposure and SEO support to reinforce long-term reputational goals Best For Projects focused on infrastructure, enterprise use cases, or seeking to attract VC interest through reputation and expertise. Final Thoughts In today‚Äôs market, founders don‚Äôt need empty headlines‚Äîthey need coverage that converts. That‚Äôs where Outset PR is leading the charge with a performance-native mindset. Their in-house acquisition technique fuses virality with metrics, helping Web3 companies turn buzz into buyers. Whether you‚Äôre launching a meme coin, gearing up for a CEX listing, or trying to onboard real users to your app, these five agencies offer the best blend of visibility, trust, and traffic. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) What makes a PR agency effective for traffic acquisition in crypto? An effective crypto PR agency for traffic acquisition delivers qualified, measurable traffic. This means the agency focuses on creating content that ranks in search engines, reaches active crypto audiences, and drives users toward specific actions, such as signing up, investing, or joining a community. How is Outset PR different from traditional PR firms? Outset PR has developed in-house media distribution technology that enables widespread placement of SEO-optimized content in outlets that rank in Google Top Stories and Discover. Unlike traditional firms that prioritize coverage volume, Outset focuses on user acquisition metrics. What are Google Top Stories and Google Discover, and why do they matter? Google Top Stories and Discover are highly visible content surfaces that drive significant mobile traffic. When an article appears in these feeds, it reaches readers actively browsing for crypto-related news‚Äîoften resulting in higher engagement rates than traditional media placements. Which agency is best for early-stage or presale projects? Outset PR is well-suited for early-stage startups, especially those focused on token launches, community building, and fast user acquisition. Its methods prioritize visibility that leads to action, which is critical during fundraising or presale periods. Is guaranteed media placement better than organic outreach? Guaranteed placements ensure your content will appear in specific outlets, which can be valuable for consistency and reach. However, organic outreach‚Äîwhen paired with performance strategy and SEO optimization‚Äîoften yields higher-quality traffic. The strongest agencies, like Outset PR and MarketAcross, combine both. Dogwifhat (WIF): Short-Term Surge Amid Long-Term Bearish Trends Dogwifhat experienced a 17.47% jump in one week, contrasting sharply with a nearly flat one-month change of -1.23% and a steep six-month decline of -56.92%. title: Bitcoin Bull Run: Cathie Wood‚Äôs Bold Prediction for Continued Growth
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Bull Run: Cathie Wood‚Äôs Bold Prediction for Continued Growth The cryptocurrency world is buzzing with renewed optimism, and at the heart of this excitement is a resounding declaration from one of the most influential voices in finance: Cathie Wood. The CEO of ARK Invest, known for her visionary insights into disruptive innovation, recently asserted that the Bitcoin bull run is far from over. This bold statement, shared on the ‚ÄòIn the Know‚Äô podcast and amplified across crypto news channels, signals a powerful conviction in Bitcoin‚Äôs continued ascent. For anyone tracking the volatile yet exhilarating journey of digital assets, Wood‚Äôs perspective offers a compelling reason to look beyond short-term fluctuations and embrace the larger narrative of growth. Is the Bitcoin Bull Run Truly Unstoppable, According to Cathie Wood? Cathie Wood ‚Äòs recent remarks underscore a deep-seated belief in Bitcoin‚Äôs long-term potential, echoing the sentiments that have positioned ARK Invest as a prominent proponent of the leading cryptocurrency. Her statement, ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre still in the bull market for Bitcoin,‚Äù isn‚Äôt just a casual observation; it‚Äôs a strategic outlook rooted in extensive research and a unique investment philosophy. For years, Wood has championed Bitcoin as a transformative asset, often likening it to ‚Äòdigital gold‚Äô and a hedge against inflation. Her conviction stems from Bitcoin‚Äôs finite supply, its decentralized nature, and its growing adoption as both a store of value and a medium of exchange. Unlike traditional assets, Bitcoin operates outside the purview of central banks, offering a unique proposition in an increasingly uncertain global economic landscape. This perspective suggests that the current upward trajectory of the Bitcoin bull run is not merely a speculative frenzy but a fundamental revaluation of a revolutionary asset. What Fuels ARK Invest ‚Äòs Enduring Optimism for Bitcoin? ARK Invest ‚Äòs approach to Bitcoin is characterized by a forward-thinking, innovation-centric lens. Their research delves into the core drivers of Bitcoin‚Äôs value proposition, moving beyond simple price charts to understand the underlying technological and economic shifts it represents. Several key factors contribute to ARK‚Äôs sustained optimism: Scarcity and Halving Cycles: Bitcoin‚Äôs supply is capped at 21 million coins. Periodic ‚Äòhalving‚Äô events, which reduce the rate at which new Bitcoin enters circulation, create built-in scarcity, often preceding significant price appreciation. The upcoming halving in 2024 is widely anticipated as a major catalyst. Institutional Adoption: The approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the United States has opened the floodgates for institutional capital, providing a regulated and accessible pathway for large investors to gain exposure to Bitcoin. This influx of sophisticated money is a significant legitimizing force. Network Effects and Security: As more users and developers join the Bitcoin network, its utility and security strengthen. The decentralized and robust nature of the blockchain ensures its resilience against censorship and manipulation. Disinflationary Hedge: In an era of increasing global debt and potential currency debasement, Bitcoin is viewed by ARK as a potent hedge against inflation, offering a predictable and sound monetary policy. This comprehensive view forms the bedrock of ARK Invest ‚Äòs long-term bullish stance, distinguishing their analysis from short-term trading narratives. How is the Broader Crypto Market Influencing Bitcoin‚Äôs Trajectory? While Bitcoin often leads the charge, its performance is inextricably linked to the broader crypto market . The overall sentiment, regulatory developments, and technological advancements within the digital asset ecosystem all play a role in shaping Bitcoin‚Äôs path. The current market environment is characterized by several influential trends: Market Trend Impact on Bitcoin Current Relevance Spot Bitcoin ETFs Facilitates institutional and retail investment, increasing liquidity and legitimacy. Massive inflows observed post-approval, signaling strong demand. Macroeconomic Climate Interest rate decisions, inflation data, and global stability affect risk appetite. Uncertainty can drive investors towards perceived safe-havens like Bitcoin. Technological Innovation Developments in blockchain, DeFi, and NFTs can attract new users and capital. Evolving use cases enhance the overall utility and appeal of digital assets. Regulatory Landscape Clearer regulations can foster trust and accelerate mainstream adoption. Ongoing discussions and frameworks are shaping the future of the market. The collective strength of the crypto market , driven by these interwoven factors, creates a fertile ground for Bitcoin‚Äôs continued expansion. As the ecosystem matures, Bitcoin benefits from increased infrastructure, liquidity, and broader acceptance. Beyond Speculation: What‚Äôs Driving the Current Bitcoin Price Action? Understanding the current Bitcoin price action requires looking beyond mere speculation. While short-term trading certainly plays a role, fundamental drivers are increasingly dictating its long-term trajectory. Bitcoin‚Äôs price is a function of supply and demand, influenced by a confluence of factors: Demand from New Investors: The ease of access provided by ETFs has brought a wave of traditional investors who previously found direct crypto ownership daunting. Whale Accumulation: Large institutional holders and high-net-worth individuals continue to accumulate Bitcoin, indicating long-term confidence. Diminishing Supply: With each halving event, the rate of new Bitcoin entering the market decreases, making existing supply more valuable if demand remains constant or increases. Global Macro Trends: As central banks grapple with inflation and economic uncertainty, Bitcoin is increasingly seen as an alternative asset that can preserve purchasing power. These drivers suggest that the recent surge in Bitcoin price is not just a fleeting trend but potentially the early stages of a more sustained upward movement, consistent with Cathie Wood‚Äôs bullish outlook. What are Cathie Wood ‚Äòs Key Insights for Navigating Bitcoin‚Äôs Volatility? While Cathie Wood is unequivocally bullish on Bitcoin, she also acknowledges the inherent volatility of disruptive assets. Her insights extend beyond simple price predictions to offer a framework for investors to navigate the often-turbulent waters of the crypto space. Key takeaways from her philosophy include: Long-Term Horizon: Wood consistently advocates for a long-term investment horizon, emphasizing that the true potential of disruptive technologies like Bitcoin is realized over years, not months. Short-term fluctuations should be viewed as noise rather than a fundamental shift in trend. Focus on Innovation: ARK Invest‚Äôs core thesis revolves around identifying and investing in innovation. For Bitcoin, this means understanding its foundational technology, its role in the future of finance, and its potential to disrupt traditional systems. Dollar-Cost Averaging: For individual investors, a strategy of dollar-cost averaging can help mitigate the impact of volatility by investing a fixed amount regularly, regardless of price. This allows investors to accumulate more Bitcoin when prices are lower. Research and Conviction: Wood stresses the importance of conducting thorough research and developing strong conviction in one‚Äôs investments. Understanding Bitcoin‚Äôs value proposition helps investors remain calm during market downturns. Her advice provides a robust framework for those looking to participate in the ongoing Bitcoin bull run , encouraging a disciplined and informed approach. Key Takeaways and Actionable Insights The convergence of Cathie Wood‚Äôs optimistic forecast, ARK Invest‚Äôs rigorous research, and the evolving dynamics of the broader crypto market paints a compelling picture for Bitcoin‚Äôs future. For investors, this translates into several actionable insights: Stay Informed: Keep abreast of macroeconomic trends, regulatory developments, and technological advancements within the crypto space. Consider Long-Term Allocation: If Bitcoin aligns with your investment goals, consider a strategic, long-term allocation rather than attempting to time the market. Diversify Wisely: While Bitcoin is a leader, a diversified portfolio within crypto and across asset classes can help manage risk. Security First: Always prioritize the security of your digital assets through reputable exchanges, hardware wallets, and strong authentication practices. The narrative around Bitcoin is shifting from a speculative gamble to a legitimate asset class with growing institutional acceptance. This evolution, strongly supported by figures like Cathie Wood, suggests that we may indeed be witnessing a sustained period of growth. A Future Forged in Digital Gold Cathie Wood ‚Äòs unwavering confidence in the continuation of the Bitcoin bull run serves as a powerful affirmation for investors and enthusiasts alike. Her perspective, backed by the deep analytical work of ARK Invest , highlights Bitcoin‚Äôs fundamental strengths and its increasing integration into the global financial system. As the crypto market matures and new catalysts emerge, the narrative of Bitcoin as a transformative asset gains further traction. The journey of the Bitcoin price may be marked by volatility, but the long-term outlook, according to one of finance‚Äôs most astute minds, remains profoundly optimistic. We are, as Wood suggests, still very much in the midst of an exciting and potentially rewarding chapter for Bitcoin. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin bull run trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin ‚Äòs institutional adoption and future price action. title: US Dollar Weakness: Unveiling the Crucial Impact of Global Trade Uncertainty
body: BitcoinWorld US Dollar Weakness: Unveiling the Crucial Impact of Global Trade Uncertainty In the dynamic world of finance, shifts in major global currencies often signal broader economic currents. For those deeply invested in cryptocurrencies, understanding these traditional market movements is not just academic; it provides crucial context for predicting liquidity, investor sentiment, and capital flows. Recently, the financial headlines have been dominated by a significant development: the US Dollar weakness . This isn‚Äôt merely a minor fluctuation; it reflects deeper anxieties stemming from persistent global trade uncertainty, while simultaneously highlighting the unexpected resilience and Euro strength . How do these macro trends in the traditional forex market impact the digital asset space? Let‚Äôs delve into the forces at play and what they mean for your portfolio. Navigating the Shifting Sands: What‚Äôs Driving the US Dollar Weakness? The US Dollar, long considered a safe haven and the world‚Äôs reserve currency, has experienced a notable dip. This decline is not a singular event but a culmination of several interconnected factors. A primary driver has been the ongoing saga of global trade relations, which continues to sow seeds of doubt among investors and policymakers alike. The lack of clear resolution on major trade agreements, coupled with sporadic escalations, has created an environment of unpredictability. Several elements contribute to this prevailing US Dollar weakness : Trade Policy Uncertainty: Lingering trade disputes between major economies, particularly the US and its key trading partners, have created a volatile landscape. Businesses face uncertainty regarding tariffs, supply chains, and market access, leading to dampened investment and economic activity. This directly impacts the perception of the US economy‚Äôs future health. Dovish Federal Reserve Stance: The Federal Reserve‚Äôs monetary policy has also played a role. With inflation remaining subdued and economic growth showing signs of moderation, the Fed has adopted a more accommodative, or ‚Äòdovish,‚Äô stance. This includes interest rate cuts or signals of potential future cuts, which reduce the attractiveness of dollar-denominated assets for international investors seeking higher yields. Slowing Global Growth Concerns: While the US economy has shown resilience, broader concerns about a global economic slowdown have led investors to reconsider their allocations. In times of uncertainty, capital often flows into traditional safe havens. However, if the source of uncertainty is trade, it can undermine confidence in the very currencies tied to those trade dynamics. Rising Fiscal Deficits: The increasing US budget deficit and national debt are long-term concerns that can weigh on currency value. While not an immediate trigger for daily fluctuations, the accumulation of debt can erode investor confidence over time, especially when coupled with other economic headwinds. The Euro‚Äôs Ascent: Understanding Euro Strength Amidst Challenges In contrast to the Dollar‚Äôs struggles, the Euro has demonstrated surprising resilience, even showing signs of significant Euro strength and setting itself up for weekly gains. This is noteworthy, given the Eurozone‚Äôs own set of economic challenges, including Brexit uncertainties and varied economic performance across member states. The Euro‚Äôs rise can be attributed to a combination of factors, both internal and external. Key drivers behind the Euro‚Äôs recent performance: Relative Economic Stability: While the Eurozone faces its own hurdles, recent economic data has, in some instances, outperformed expectations, particularly in key member states like Germany and France. This has provided a degree of confidence to investors. European Central Bank (ECB) Expectations: While the ECB has also maintained an accommodative stance, the market‚Äôs perception of its future policy path relative to the Federal Reserve can influence currency movements. If the market anticipates less aggressive easing from the ECB compared to the Fed, it can lend support to the Euro. Reduced Political Risk: Although political risks always exist within the Eurozone, some of the more immediate and acute concerns (like certain populist movements or specific national elections) have receded, providing a calmer backdrop for the currency. Rebalancing of Global Portfolios: As investors reduce their exposure to the US Dollar due to its perceived weakness, capital naturally seeks alternative major currencies. The Euro, as the second-largest reserve currency, often becomes a primary beneficiary of such reallocations, contributing directly to its observed Euro strength . This dynamic interplay between the two major currencies highlights the complex nature of the forex market , where relative strengths and weaknesses are constantly being reassessed. Global Trade Uncertainty: A Persistent Headwind for Currency Market Dynamics The overarching theme influencing both the Dollar‚Äôs decline and the Euro‚Äôs rise is global trade uncertainty . This pervasive issue extends beyond bilateral disputes and touches upon the very fabric of international commerce. The imposition of tariffs, retaliatory measures, and the constant threat of new trade barriers disrupt established supply chains, depress global demand, and create a climate of apprehension for businesses worldwide. Consider the impact on various sectors: Manufacturing: Industries reliant on international supply chains face increased costs and operational disruptions, leading to reduced output and investment. Agriculture: Farmers are often caught in the crossfire of trade disputes, facing diminished export markets and lower commodity prices. Technology: Companies with complex global operations, particularly in electronics and software, grapple with restrictions on technology transfer and market access. This uncertainty not only impacts economic growth but also directly influences currency market dynamics . When trade flows are unpredictable, the demand for currencies used in those transactions can fluctuate wildly. For instance, a decline in global trade volume can reduce demand for the US Dollar as a medium of exchange, contributing to its weakness. Conversely, if a resolution to trade tensions appears on the horizon, it can inject optimism and lead to a strengthening of currencies previously hit by uncertainty. Table: Key Factors Influencing USD and EUR Recent Movements Factor Impact on US Dollar Impact on Euro Global Trade Uncertainty Negative (Dampens investment, creates economic apprehension) Mixed (Can benefit from USD weakness, but global slowdown still a risk) Central Bank Policy (Dovish Stance) Negative (Reduces attractiveness of dollar assets) Relatively Positive (Less aggressive easing than Fed perceived) Economic Data & Growth Mixed (Some slowing, but still resilient) Positive (Some outperformance, relative stability) Fiscal Policy/Debt Negative (Long-term concern for investor confidence) Neutral to Positive (Relative to US) How Do Currency Fluctuations Impact Your Investment Portfolio? For investors, particularly those with diversified portfolios that include traditional assets and cryptocurrencies, understanding currency fluctuations is paramount. These movements can significantly affect the value of international investments, commodity prices, and even the relative attractiveness of digital assets. Impact on International Investments: If you hold investments denominated in a foreign currency (e.g., European stocks for a US investor), a weakening US Dollar means your foreign assets are worth more when converted back to dollars. Conversely, a strengthening dollar erodes the value of those foreign holdings. This directly benefits those holding Euro-denominated assets when the Euro strengthens against the Dollar. Commodity Prices: Many major commodities, such as oil and gold, are priced in US Dollars. A weaker Dollar makes these commodities cheaper for holders of other currencies, potentially increasing demand and pushing prices up. This can be a boon for commodity-exporting nations and investors in commodity-linked assets. Cryptocurrency Market Dynamics: While cryptocurrencies are often touted as independent of traditional financial markets, they are not entirely decoupled. A weaker US Dollar can make Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies more attractive as alternative stores of value, especially for international investors seeking to hedge against fiat currency depreciation. Conversely, if investors are seeking safe havens, a weakening dollar might sometimes push capital into crypto, but extreme volatility in crypto could also push capital back into strong fiat. The interconnectedness is complex but present. Corporate Earnings: Multinational corporations are heavily impacted by currency movements. A strong home currency can make exports more expensive and reduce the value of foreign earnings when repatriated. A weaker home currency can boost exports and make foreign earnings more valuable. Recognizing these effects allows investors to make more informed decisions about asset allocation and risk management, especially given the current Forex trends . Navigating the Forex Market: Actionable Insights for Investors Given the current landscape of US Dollar weakness , Euro strength , and pervasive global trade uncertainty , how can investors best position themselves? Navigating the complex forex market requires a strategic approach, blending awareness of macro trends with prudent risk management. What Strategies Can Help Mitigate Currency Risk? Diversification Across Currencies: Do not put all your eggs in one currency basket. Holding assets denominated in various strong currencies can help cushion the blow if one particular currency weakens significantly. This includes considering exposure to currencies like the Euro, Yen, or even certain emerging market currencies that show promise. Hedging Strategies: For those with significant international exposure, employing hedging instruments like currency forwards, futures, or options can protect against adverse currency movements. These tools allow you to lock in an exchange rate for a future transaction, reducing unpredictability. Investing in Export-Oriented Companies: If your home currency is weakening (like the US Dollar), companies that derive a significant portion of their revenue from exports may benefit. Their products become cheaper for foreign buyers, potentially boosting sales and profitability. Consider Commodity Exposure: As discussed, a weaker US Dollar can often support commodity prices. Investors might consider adding exposure to commodities like gold, silver, or industrial metals as a hedge against currency depreciation and inflation. Stay Informed on Central Bank Policies: Monetary policy is a primary driver of currency values. Keeping abreast of announcements from the Federal Reserve, European Central Bank, and other major central banks can provide critical clues about future currency movements. Changes in interest rates or quantitative easing programs directly impact a currency‚Äôs attractiveness. Monitor Geopolitical Developments: Trade uncertainty and other geopolitical tensions are significant influencers. Events like ongoing trade negotiations, elections, or major international disputes can trigger rapid shifts in currency valuations. Being aware of these developments helps anticipate market reactions. Understanding Long-Term Forex Trends vs. Short-Term Volatility It is crucial to differentiate between short-term market noise and long-term Forex trends . While daily fluctuations are common, sustained movements often reflect fundamental economic shifts. The current US Dollar weakness and Euro strength , driven by global trade uncertainty, appear to be more than just transient movements. They suggest a re-evaluation of global economic leadership and the relative attractiveness of different economic blocs. For crypto investors, this means observing how these macro shifts influence the broader liquidity environment. When traditional markets exhibit volatility or uncertainty, some capital may flow into cryptocurrencies as a perceived alternative. Conversely, extreme volatility in crypto could see a flight back to perceived fiat stability. Understanding these interconnections is key to navigating both traditional and digital asset landscapes. Conclusion: Adapting to the New Currency Reality The narrative of US Dollar weakness and burgeoning Euro strength , set against a backdrop of persistent global trade uncertainty , paints a vivid picture of a world in economic flux. These are not isolated events but rather interconnected phenomena that ripple through the entire financial ecosystem, profoundly impacting currency market dynamics and influencing global Forex trends . For investors, this environment presents both challenges and opportunities. While the Dollar‚Äôs slide might signal headwinds for some, it simultaneously creates avenues for growth in other currencies and asset classes, including potentially benefiting the appeal of digital assets as alternative stores of value. Staying informed, diversifying portfolios, and understanding the intricate relationships between global trade, central bank policies, and currency movements are essential for successful navigation. The ability to adapt to these shifting currency realities will be a defining characteristic of resilient investment strategies in the years to come. By closely monitoring these macro-economic indicators, investors can make more informed decisions, whether their focus is on traditional equities, commodities, or the rapidly evolving cryptocurrency space. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the US Dollar, Euro, and other major currencies in the global liquidity landscape. This post US Dollar Weakness: Unveiling the Crucial Impact of Global Trade Uncertainty first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Solo Bitcoin miner wins full block reward of ‚Äé3.173 BTC
body: A solo Bitcoin miner won the full block reward of ‚Äé3.173 BTC using a small-scale mining rig with 2.3 petahash per second (PH/s). Mempool Space website showed that the solo miner known as Solo CK won a total of $349,028 worth of Bitcoin subsidy and fees after solving block number 903,883. The miner netted ‚Äé3.10918096 BTC, equivalent to $338,105 after paying the pool‚Äôs fees of 0.06345267 BTC. The miner won the Bitcoin block reward through the CKpool platform while running hardware with a hashrate of 2.3 PH/s. The CKpool dev and admin, Con‚ÄØKolivas, posted about the achievement of the solo miner on X and congratulated him. Source: Con‚ÄØKolivas This solo miner beat incredible odds At around 2.3‚ÄØPH/s, Solo CK controlled a tiny fraction of the global Bitcoin network hashrate, which ranges between 600 and 700‚ÄØEH/s (exahash per second). Statistically, this translates to a ~0.004% chance per day of finding a block‚Äîwhich equates to Con‚ÄØKolivas‚Äô calculation of ‚Äúonce every 8‚ÄØyears‚Äù average. The log output shared by the CKpool admin on X showed that the solo miner‚Äôs rig averaged ~2.3 PH/s over the past hour and between ~2.17 to 2.22 PH/s over the past 1 to 7 days prior to solving the block. This average hashrate is considered high for a solo miner, suggesting a powerful setup roughly equivalent to the output of 10 Antminer S21 units. The log also showed that the block difficulty was at 941 trillion, and the solo miner submitted about 79.6 trillion shares (or attempts) before solving the block. This equates to 68% of the expected effort needed to solve a Bitcoin block, meaning the solo miner solved the block earlier than average. Solo miners solved many Bitcoin blocks this year This is not the first time a solo miner hits the jackpot and takes the full Bitcoin block reward. In February 2025, a solo miner solved block number 883,181 and won 3.125 BTC block, which was worth over $300,000. A Bitcoin miner said on X that the winner used an implementation of the CKPool and speculated the usage of Bitaxe. In March another solo miner solved block number 887,212 and won around 3.15 BTC, equal to $263,000 at the time. Con Kolivas shared the news on X and said the miner used a 480 GH/s Bitaxe device to solve the block with a hashrate of just 3.3 TH/s on CKpool. Such a miner has less than a 1-in-a-million chance of finding a block per day ‚Äî meaning, on average, it would take about 3,500 years to discover one. Bitaxe is a DIY open-source Bitcoin miner often used by hobbyists. It‚Äôs made with a single ASIC chip , typically from the Antminer S9 series and has a hashrate of around 480 GH/s. On June 5th, a solo miner won $330,000 after mining block number 899,826 and getting 3.125 BTC. The miner obtained the block rewards through the CKpool and used a high hashrate of 259 PH/s, which is based on a rental basis from a cloud service. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? title: BONK Eyes Breakout as ETF Buzz and Burn Trigger Spark Fresh Rally
body: Solana-based memecoin BONK dropped back after jumping in excess of 20% earlier this week , but remains in bullish mode amid increased trader activity. BONK surged 21% in a 24-hour period into Thursday and positioned itself as the strongest performer among major cryptocurrencies. It was recently trading at $0.00001673, a 1.68% gain, with price action ranging from $0.00001606 to $0.00001751, a 9.4% intraday swing. Fueling tge momentum is mounting speculation around a 2x leveraged BONK ETF, with Tuttle Capital Management confirming July 16 as the earliest potential launch date pending regulatory approval. Adding to the bullish sentiment, BONK is on the cusp of reaching 1 million holders , a milestone that will trigger a 1 trillion token burn, potentially slashing supply and amplifying upside pressure. It currently boasts over 943,000 holders. Technically, BONK has broken free from both falling wedge and symmetrical triangle patterns, indicating a transition from consolidation to potential expansion, according to CoinDesk Research's analytical model. Analysts point to firm support at $0.000013 and resistance near $0.000018. A successful breach above this resistance could unlock a potential path toward $0.00003372, representing a possible 100% upside if momentum holds. This rally coincides with broader growth in the Solana ecosystem, including increased validator participation and infrastructure investment. With strong fundamentals, technical support, and speculative catalysts aligned, BONK could be poised for an extended breakout in the near term. Technical Analysis Highlights BONK peaked at $0.00001751 around 01:00 UTC with a notable 1.66B volume spike, establishing a high-volume resistance zone. Price traded in a tight band from 03:00 to 12:00 UTC, signaling consolidation post-rally. Key support at $0.00001627 held firm throughout the trading session despite intraday pullbacks. BONK experienced a sharp 1.5% reversal at 13:52 UTC on heavy volume (31.9B), validating $0.0000164 as near-term support. Resistance is forming near $0.000017, tested multiple times between 02:00 and 06:00 UTC. Broader support zone remains around $0.000013, per macro-level chart patterns. BONK has broken out of both falling wedge and symmetrical triangle formations, typically bullish setups. RSI suggests room for further upside, with no overbought signals evident at current levels.` Disclaimer: Parts of this article were generated with the assistance from AI tools and reviewed by our editorial team to ensure accuracy and adherence to our standards . title: Lorenzo Protocol: Pioneering USD1+ Fund Debuts on BNB Chain Testnet
body: BitcoinWorld Lorenzo Protocol: Pioneering USD1+ Fund Debuts on BNB Chain Testnet The cryptocurrency landscape is constantly evolving, with innovation driving new possibilities for asset utilization. A significant stride in this direction comes from Lorenzo Protocol , a pioneering platform dedicated to enhancing Bitcoin‚Äôs utility. Their recent deployment of the groundbreaking USD1+ fund on the BNB Chain testnet marks a pivotal moment, signaling a new era for Bitcoin liquidity and on-chain fund finance. This move promises to unlock unprecedented opportunities for yield generation within the Bitcoin ecosystem, merging traditional finance with the dynamic world of decentralized finance. What is Lorenzo Protocol and Its Vision for Bitcoin Liquidity? Lorenzo Protocol is not just another DeFi project; it‚Äôs a dedicated Bitcoin liquidity finance platform designed to unlock the immense potential of Bitcoin beyond its role as a mere store of value. For years, Bitcoin has been the king of cryptocurrencies, but its native blockchain isn‚Äôt inherently designed for complex decentralized applications. This has led to solutions like wrapped Bitcoin (wBTC) to bring BTC liquidity to other chains, but Lorenzo Protocol aims for a more native, efficient approach to leverage Bitcoin‚Äôs power. The core vision of Lorenzo Protocol revolves around creating a robust infrastructure that allows Bitcoin holders to participate in various yield-generating activities directly, without necessarily moving their assets off the Bitcoin network or relying solely on wrapped versions. By focusing on ‚ÄúBitcoin liquidity,‚Äù Lorenzo seeks to build bridges that allow BTC to flow seamlessly into diverse financial instruments and strategies, ultimately enhancing its utility and appeal for a broader range of investors. This initiative is crucial for the burgeoning BTCFi (Bitcoin Finance) ecosystem, aiming to provide a comprehensive suite of financial services built directly on or around Bitcoin. Key Aspects of Lorenzo Protocol‚Äôs Vision: Unlocking Dormant Capital: Billions of dollars in Bitcoin sit idle. Lorenzo aims to put this capital to work. Native Bitcoin Integration: Developing solutions that are as close to native Bitcoin interaction as possible, reducing reliance on centralized custodians or complex wrapping mechanisms. Diversified Yield Opportunities: Providing access to a variety of income streams for Bitcoin holders, moving beyond simple lending. Building BTCFi Infrastructure: Contributing to the overall growth and maturity of the Bitcoin decentralized finance ecosystem. Decoding the Revolutionary USD1+ Fund At the heart of Lorenzo Protocol‚Äôs latest announcement is the USD1+ on-chain traded fund (OTF) . This isn‚Äôt your average crypto fund; it represents a novel approach to combining diverse income streams into a single, transparent, and accessible investment vehicle. Backed by World Liberty Financial‚Äôs USD1 stablecoin, the USD1+ fund is engineered to provide stable returns by diversifying its strategies across multiple financial landscapes. The structure of the USD1+ fund is particularly intriguing because it draws income from three distinct yet complementary sources: Real-World Assets (RWA): This component bridges the gap between traditional finance and decentralized finance. Income from RWAs could include yields generated from tokenized real estate, treasury bills, private credit, or other tangible assets that are brought onto the blockchain. This provides a layer of stability and uncorrelated returns, often appealing to investors seeking refuge from crypto volatility. Quantitative Trading Strategies: This involves sophisticated algorithms and automated systems that execute trades based on predefined rules and market analysis. These strategies can range from arbitrage and market making to trend following, aiming to generate consistent returns regardless of market direction. The ‚Äúquant‚Äù aspect brings a professional, data-driven approach to fund management. Decentralized Finance (DeFi): The fund also taps into the vibrant DeFi ecosystem. This could involve participating in yield farming protocols, providing liquidity to decentralized exchanges (DEXs), engaging in lending/borrowing protocols, or utilizing other innovative DeFi primitives to generate yield. This component offers exposure to the high-growth potential of the crypto native space. Returns generated by the USD1+ fund are paid out in USD1, a stablecoin, ensuring that investors receive their income in a predictable, non-volatile asset. This multi-faceted approach aims to create a robust and resilient fund, offering a compelling proposition for those looking to diversify their crypto portfolio with a yield-generating asset that transcends typical crypto-only strategies. Why BNB Chain? The Strategic Deployment on BNB Chain Testnet The choice of BNB Chain for the deployment of the USD1+ fund ‚Äòs testnet is a strategic one, reflecting several key advantages that the blockchain offers. A ‚Äútestnet‚Äù is essentially a replica of a blockchain‚Äôs main network, designed for developers to test new features, applications, and smart contracts without risking real funds. This environment is crucial for identifying bugs, optimizing performance, and gathering community feedback before a full mainnet launch. BNB Chain , formerly Binance Smart Chain, has emerged as a formidable player in the blockchain space, known for its: High Transaction Throughput: BNB Chain can handle a large volume of transactions per second, making it efficient for dApps that require quick processing. Low Transaction Fees: Compared to some other major blockchains, BNB Chain typically offers significantly lower gas fees, making it more cost-effective for users and developers. EVM Compatibility: Being Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) compatible means that developers can easily migrate or build dApps using familiar tools and languages (like Solidity), fostering a robust developer ecosystem. Large User Base: BNB Chain boasts a massive and active user base, thanks in part to its association with Binance, the world‚Äôs largest cryptocurrency exchange. This provides a fertile ground for new protocols to gain traction. Deploying the USD1+ fund on the BNB Chain testnet allows Lorenzo Protocol to rigorously test the fund‚Äôs smart contracts, ensure the seamless integration of its various income-generating components, and validate its operational efficiency in a live, albeit simulated, environment. This phase is critical for ensuring the security, stability, and reliability of the USD1+ fund before it goes live on the mainnet, where real capital will be involved. The strategic choice of BNB Chain underscores Lorenzo Protocol‚Äôs commitment to accessibility, efficiency, and reaching a broad audience. The Broader Impact: Enhancing Bitcoin Liquidity and BTCFi The deployment of the USD1+ fund by Lorenzo Protocol is more than just a new product; it‚Äôs a significant step forward in the ongoing quest to enhance Bitcoin liquidity and mature the broader Bitcoin Finance (BTCFi) ecosystem. For years, Bitcoin‚Äôs primary role has been as a digital store of value, often sitting dormant in wallets. While its price appreciation has been significant, its utility within the decentralized financial landscape has been somewhat limited compared to other programmable blockchains like Ethereum. The challenge has always been how to make Bitcoin ‚Äúwork‚Äù in DeFi without compromising its security or decentralization. Solutions like wrapped Bitcoin (wBTC) have allowed BTC to be used on Ethereum and other EVM-compatible chains, but these often involve custodial risks or a departure from Bitcoin‚Äôs native environment. Lorenzo Protocol, by focusing on Bitcoin liquidity finance, is aiming to create more direct and secure pathways for BTC holders to engage with yield-generating opportunities. The USD1+ fund contributes to this by: Creating a Yield-Bearing BTC-Adjacent Asset: While returns are paid in USD1, the underlying strategies aim to utilize Bitcoin or Bitcoin-derived liquidity. This allows BTC holders to indirectly benefit from diversified strategies. Showcasing Interoperability: The deployment on BNB Chain highlights the growing trend of multi-chain strategies and the need for seamless asset flow between different blockchain ecosystems. Attracting New Capital to BTCFi: By offering a professionally managed, diversified fund, Lorenzo Protocol can attract institutional and retail investors who are hesitant to directly engage with complex DeFi protocols but are keen to put their Bitcoin to work. This initiative underscores a crucial evolution in the crypto space: the transition from simply holding Bitcoin to actively leveraging it as a productive asset within a sophisticated financial ecosystem. As BTCFi continues to grow, solutions like Lorenzo Protocol‚Äôs USD1+ fund will be instrumental in unlocking trillions of dollars in dormant Bitcoin capital. The Future of Finance: Understanding the On-chain Fund Revolution The concept of an ‚Äúon-chain fund‚Äù is a paradigm shift in asset management, moving away from traditional, opaque, and often costly financial structures towards a more transparent, efficient, and accessible model. The USD1+ on-chain traded fund (OTF) exemplifies this revolution, demonstrating how blockchain technology can fundamentally reshape how investment vehicles are created, managed, and accessed. What makes an on-chain fund revolutionary? Feature Traditional Fund On-chain Fund (e.g., USD1+ OTF) Transparency Limited visibility into holdings, fees, and performance. Full transparency of assets, transactions, and performance on a public ledger. Accessibility High minimum investments, geographical restrictions, accredited investor requirements. Lower barriers to entry, global accessibility, fractional ownership possible. Efficiency/Costs High management fees, numerous intermediaries, slow settlement. Automated via smart contracts, reduced fees, near-instant settlement. Liquidity Often illiquid, redemption periods. Potentially higher liquidity through tokenization and secondary markets. Composability Stand-alone, difficult to integrate with other financial products. Modular, can be integrated into other DeFi protocols and dApps. The USD1+ OTF , by operating entirely on the blockchain, eliminates many of the inefficiencies and trust requirements inherent in traditional finance. Smart contracts automate the fund‚Äôs operations, from asset allocation to return distribution, minimizing human error and potential for manipulation. This level of automation and transparency builds trust and reduces operational overhead, potentially leading to better net returns for investors. The rise of on-chain fund s signifies a broader trend towards democratizing finance. It allows individuals worldwide to access sophisticated investment strategies that were once exclusive to institutional investors. As regulations evolve and blockchain technology matures, we can expect to see more diverse and complex on-chain funds emerge, further blurring the lines between traditional and decentralized finance and solidifying the blockchain‚Äôs role as the infrastructure for the future of asset management. Benefits and Actionable Insights for Investors The deployment of the USD1+ fund offers several compelling benefits for various types of investors: Diversified Yield: For Bitcoin holders, this presents an opportunity to earn yield from a mix of RWA, quant strategies, and DeFi, reducing reliance on single-asset exposure. Stablecoin Returns: Receiving returns in USD1 provides predictability and stability, mitigating the volatility often associated with crypto assets. Bridging TradFi and DeFi: The RWA component offers a familiar investment avenue for traditional investors looking to dip their toes into the crypto space with a managed fund. Transparency: The on-chain nature means investors can verify transactions and fund activity, fostering greater trust. Actionable Insights: Monitor Testnet Progress: Keep an eye on Lorenzo Protocol ‚Äòs updates regarding the testnet phase. Successful testing is a strong indicator for mainnet launch. Research USD1 Stablecoin: Understand the backing and stability mechanisms of World Liberty Financial‚Äôs USD1 stablecoin. Evaluate Risk Appetite: While diversified, all investment funds carry risk. Assess if the fund‚Äôs strategies align with your risk tolerance. Stay Informed on Regulations: The landscape for on-chain fund s and RWA is evolving. Staying updated on regulatory developments is crucial. Challenges and Considerations on the Horizon While the prospects for the USD1+ fund and Lorenzo Protocol are exciting, it‚Äôs essential to consider potential challenges: Smart Contract Risk: Despite rigorous testing, smart contracts are susceptible to bugs or exploits. Audits are crucial but not foolproof. Market Volatility: While diversified, the DeFi and quant components are still exposed to cryptocurrency market volatility. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory environment for on-chain fund s and RWA is still developing globally, which could impact operations. Adoption and Liquidity: The success of the fund will depend on widespread adoption and sufficient liquidity for its underlying assets and the USD1 stablecoin. Centralization Concerns: While an ‚Äúon-chain fund,‚Äù the degree of decentralization in its management and governance will be a key factor for long-term sustainability. Lorenzo Protocol will need to navigate these challenges carefully, prioritizing security, transparency, and community engagement to build lasting trust and ensure the fund‚Äôs long-term viability. The Road Ahead for Lorenzo Protocol The deployment on the BNB Chain testnet is just the beginning for the USD1+ fund and Lorenzo Protocol . The next critical phase will involve comprehensive testing, gathering community feedback, and iterating on the protocol to ensure robustness and user-friendliness. Following a successful testnet period, the anticipation will build for a mainnet launch, which will allow real capital to flow into the fund. Looking further ahead, Lorenzo Protocol‚Äôs commitment to enhancing Bitcoin liquidity suggests a roadmap that could include: Integration with more blockchains to broaden accessibility. Development of additional yield-generating products tailored for Bitcoin holders. Exploring decentralized governance models for the protocol and its funds. Forging strategic partnerships within both the traditional finance and decentralized finance sectors to expand its reach and offerings. The journey of transforming Bitcoin from a dormant store of value into a dynamic, yield-generating asset is a long one, but Lorenzo Protocol is clearly positioning itself at the forefront of this evolution. Conclusion: A New Dawn for Bitcoin‚Äôs Potential Lorenzo Protocol ‚Äòs deployment of the USD1+ fund on the BNB Chain testnet is a truly significant development, heralding a new era for Bitcoin liquidity and the broader on-chain fund landscape. By innovatively blending real-world assets, quantitative trading, and decentralized finance strategies, the USD1+ fund offers a compelling, diversified yield opportunity for investors eager to put their Bitcoin to work. This move not only expands the utility of Bitcoin but also underscores the growing maturity and sophistication of the decentralized finance ecosystem. As we watch Lorenzo Protocol navigate its testnet phase and prepare for a full launch, it‚Äôs clear that the future of finance is becoming increasingly transparent, accessible, and interconnected. The journey to unlock Bitcoin‚Äôs full potential has just gained a powerful new ally. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin liquidity trends and on-chain fund innovations, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin‚Äôs institutional adoption and yield opportunities. This post Lorenzo Protocol: Pioneering USD1+ Fund Debuts on BNB Chain Testnet first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Ethereum and Beyond: EthCC Side Events Focus on Mainstream Adoption, Stablecoins and Beach Swag
body: The Ethereum Community Conference (EthCC) drew a large crowd this year, as thousands of crypto members gathered in Cannes, France. While the annual conference primarily focuses on the Ethereum sector, EthCC 2025 ended up attracting industry experts across different ecosystems. This was apparent from the multiple side events that took place during the conference. From Bitcoin meetups to various stablecoin houses, EthCC proved to be an event focused on the crypto ecosystem as a whole. There are almost 100 events just for tomorrow at @EthCC Here are some standouts from @borderlessxyz @avax @bitvavocom & @berachain But with massive conferences like this, we want to help you curate these side events to YOUR tastes DMs are open for anyone interested pic.twitter.com/jHbQIJ4rTd ‚Äî sheeets.xyz (@sheeetsxyz) June 30, 2025 Robinhood‚Äôs Event Attracts The Mainstream For example, fintech firm Robinhood hosted an event dedicated to announcing its new line of crypto products and services for users in the United States and European Union. Robinhood‚Äôs exclusive 300-person event called ‚ÄúTo Catch a Token‚Äù took place at the iconic Ch√¢teau de la Croix des Gardes in Cannes. Robinhood Chairman and CEO Vlad Tenev took center stage to announce that EU users can now access US stock tokens on the platform. Robinhood Senior Director and COO Tanya Denisova further mentioned that Robinhood has expanded its presence to France, along with a number of other countries across Europe. Other announcements included Robinhood‚Äôs rollout of crypto staking for eligible US customers. The platform will begin with staking on Ethereum and Solana (SOL). Crypto staking was made available to all Robinhood customers in the EU and EEA last year. Overall, the event showed Robinhood‚Äôs desire to take over the crypto sector. The fintech giant has about 26 million customers based in the US and is expecting similar growth across different regions. Johann Kerbrat, GM and SVP of Crypto at Robinhood, told Cryptonews that one of the goals behind Robinhood‚Äôs event was to demonstrate how a classic US brokerage is working on a blockchain solution . ‚ÄúHowever, the platform looks the same‚Äînothing has changed visually,‚Äù he said. It‚Äôs also important to point out that many of the event attendees were not involved in the crypto sector but rather traditional finance Robinhood users. Stellar‚Äôs CPO Discusses Stablecoins at EthCC Stable House While a number of TradFi users attended Robinhood‚Äôs side event, the opposite was true at ‚ÄúStable House.‚Äù Payments infrastructure company Borderless.xyz hosted Stable House, bringing together Web3 developers to discuss stablecoin innovations at a seaside villa. Tomer Weller, chief product officer at Stellar, kicked off the event with a discussion on real-world stablecoin use cases. He began by explaining how the Stellar Development Foundation (SDF) has piloted a blockchain-powered aid distribution system in Ukraine. Weller also mentioned that decentralized finance (DeFi) has become possible on Stellar with the recent implementation of smart contracts. He elaborated, noting that the most interesting aspect Stellar has seen since this development is DeFi use cases on a base layer of stablecoins. ‚ÄúWe think of the stablecoin base layer as a checking account for this new type of finance,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúDeFi allows users to build more financial instruments to make these a savings account equivalent.‚Äù Weller explained that Stellar users have wallets that mainly hold stablecoins because of inflation against local currency. DeFi allows users access to real-world assets (RWAs) and yield. He added that Stellar is currently witnessing ‚Äúa full stack of everyday financial instruments being built with stablecoins as a base layer.‚Äù Binance Discusses Crypto Payments with Cannes Mayor Cryptocurrency exchange Binance hosted a side event focused on crypto payments at the exclusive H√¥tel Barri√®re Le Majestic in Cannes. The intimate event was attended by Mayor David Lisnard of Cannes, who spoke in detail about crypto payment use cases across the region. Mayor Lisnard noted that Cannes is becoming one of the most crypto-friendly cities in the world. Interestingly, more than 80 merchants across the French Riviera now accept stablecoin and cryptocurrency payments via Binance Pay . Mayor Lisnard added that this has helped boost the city‚Äôs already booming tourism sector. Indeed, crypto payments appear to be gaining traction across Cannes. Many merchants, hotels, and restaurants in the area now display a sticker on their storefronts to let customers know they accept cryptocurrency. No way you can pay with @MetaMask for ice creams in Cannes Adoption is here fr fr pic.twitter.com/fuy2S0dMZm ‚Äî hoobi.eth (@hubkotl) June 28, 2025 EthCC Crypto Beach Swag Finally, most of the EthCC side events had crypto swag, which helped attendees keep cool during the European heat wave. Robinhood attendees received much-needed fans to cool off during the heat of the day, along with a hat that reads ‚Äúmarket cap.‚Äù The Stellar team gave out tank tops labeled ‚ÄúGirls Gone Stable,‚Äù which were seen on multiple crypto enthusiasts at EthCC. Bitstamp and Mastercard also gave out t-shirts, while flip-flops were provided by UR Coin. If the stuff on the right feels too hard, you can just wear the shirt. #StableSummer pic.twitter.com/iErMPQDrU8 ‚Äî Stellar (@StellarOrg) July 3, 2025 Another fun swag item was NFT-embedded press-on nails from Chipped Social. Attendees wearing the nails could tap a smartphone with their NFT-chipped nail to share their contact information and social media links. Last night someone asked me if I‚Äôm founder of @chippedsocial after showing them ‚Äútap my nail to connect with me‚Äù magic and I never felt more proud of @winnyirl and her amazing team pic.twitter.com/cu93wOiwAC ‚Äî ‚ü† Anett ‚ü† anett.eth (@AnettRolikova) July 4, 2025 The post Ethereum and Beyond: EthCC Side Events Focus on Mainstream Adoption, Stablecoins and Beach Swag appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Ethereum price action confirms bull trap at $2,550: major support level lost
body: Ethereum has lost the $2,550 high time frame resistance on multiple candle closes, confirming a possible bull trap. The price now risks returning to range lows, with support sitting at $2,226. Ethereum ( ETH ) has reacted bearishly from a critical high time frame conflict zone near $2,550. This level had served as a key resistance in recent weeks and was briefly reclaimed before being lost again on several candle closures‚Äîa classic indication of a bull trap formation. Rejection at this HTF level carries significant implications for the coming weeks, particularly if ETH continues to trade below this pivotal zone. Key technical points $2,550 HTF Resistance Rejection: Price closed back below this level after a brief reclaim. Bearish Confluence Zone: Includes 0.618 Fibonacci, dynamic SI resistance, and value area high. Next Major Support at $2,226: Key level where price may find liquidity and stage a potential reversal. ETHUSDT (4H) Chart, Source: TradingView After briefly reclaiming the $2,550 resistance level, Ethereum failed to sustain above it and has since closed multiple candles below. This development is technically meaningful, as $2,550 has been a well-established HTF resistance that has challenged price action for weeks. The brief reclaim followed by rejection suggests a deviation, a bearish pattern indicating failed upward momentum. The rejection from this region confirms the likelihood of a bull trap, a situation where bullish breakout signals draw in buyers, only for the price to sharply reverse below the resistance. This is not merely a local failure, but a broader technical signal suggesting Ethereum may be entering a more extended consolidation or corrective phase. You might also like: Why are Bitcoin and altcoins going down today? Several technical confluences reinforce the significance of this rejection. These include the 0.618 Fibonacci retracement from the latest swing, dynamic structural resistance (SI resistance), and the value area high from the previous trading range. The convergence of these indicators strengthens the resistance zone‚Äôs credibility and highlights the impact of the failed breakout. In the near term, Ethereum faces increased downside risk unless it reclaims $2,550, a scenario that appears less likely as the price consolidates below it. The next major level to monitor is the $2,226 support. This zone could act as a liquidity pocket and may offer a potential reversal setup for a move back toward recent highs. Until such a recovery occurs, continued downside remains the more probable outcome. What to expect in the coming price action As long as Ethereum remains below the $2,550 HTF resistance, bearish momentum will likely persist. A rotation toward the $2,226 support zone appears probable, where a short-term reversal could emerge. Read more: Bitrue opens stock trading to the 24/7 blockchain clock, but there‚Äôs a fine print

title: Bitcoin ETFs See $602 Million Surge as Inflow Momentum Builds
body: Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) continued their red-hot streak with a $602 million inflow, led by heavy activity in Fidelity‚Äôs and Blackrock‚Äôs funds. Ether ETFs also bounced back with $148.57 million in net inflows, riding high on renewed investor confidence. title: EOS price prediction 2025-2031: Will EOS reach $10?
body: Key takeaways In 2025, EOS could reach a maximum price of $0.988 and an average price of $0.823. By 2028, the EOS price value can reach a maximum of $2.63. The EOS price in 2031 could reach a maximum possible level of $4.28 and an average forecast price of $4.12. EOS , a completely decentralized network, favors the evolution and expansion stages of other bigger decentralized applications (dApps). It offers multitudes of benefits in terms of efficiency, user empowerment, and the ability to provide various services. The network has experienced a long series of developments since its initial launch in the cryptocurrency market in 2017. Since then, it has reached new highs, featuring the monumental $4 billion Initial Coin Offering (ICO) as its best. However, it still falls behind in its claim of establishing itself as an ‚ÄúEthereum Killer‚Äù, as its stability has remained questionable. Can EOS reach $10 soon? Let‚Äôs get into the EOS price prediction and technical analysis. Overview Cryptocurrency EOS Token EOS Price $0.478 (-4.55) Market Cap $827.19M Trading Volume $2.46M Circulating Supply 2.1B EOS All-time High $22.89 (Apr 29, 2018) All-time Low $0.4802 (Oct 23, 2017) 24-hour High $0.5034 24-hour Low $0.4804 EOS price prediction: Technical analysis Metric Value Price Volatility 10.72% 50-Day SMA $0.733548 14-Day RSI 53.85 Sentiment Bearish Fear & Greed Index 73 (Greed) Green Days 12/30 (40%) 200-Day SMA $0.621861 EOS price analysis: EOS plunges to $0.478 as bears take over TL;DR Breakdown : EOS price analysis confirmed a downward trend at $0.478 as selling pressure returns. The altcoin lost 0.80% of its value. EOS coin might find support around $0.475. On July 4, 2025, the EOS price analysis revealed a bearish daily trend for the altcoin. The EOS value decreased to $0.478 in the past 24 hours. From an overall analysis, the altcoin lost up to 4.55% of its value today, as sellers took over the market, which caused a heavy price depreciation. The altcoin was unsuccessful in breaking above the $0.50 local resistance zone earlier, and it might retest it again during the next trading session if support appears. EOS 1-day price chart analysis The one-day price chart of the EOS coin confirmed a decreasing trend as price oscillation favors sellers. The EOS/USD value stepped down to $0.478 today. A red candlestick on the price chart signifies bearish pressure. The distance between the Bollinger bands defines the volatility. This distance is less, leading to low volatility. Moving ahead, the upper limit of the Bollinger Bands indicator, acting as the resistance band, has shifted to $0.529. Whereby its lower limit, serving as the support, has moved to $0.470. EOSUSD chart by TradingView The Relative Strength Index (RSI) indicator is present in the lower neutral area. The indicator‚Äôs value has decreased to index 36.05. The downward curve on the RSI graph signifies dominance among sellers. If selling activities continue to intensify, further instability within the market conditions can be expected. EOS/USD 4-hour price chart The four-hour price analysis of the EOS coin also confirmed the presence of selling pressure for the altcoin. The altcoin‚Äôs value has decreased again to $0.478 as bears are trying to continue their streak. Also, the lower levels of volatility mark a lesser chance of a reversal in market trends. The Bollinger Bands have shrunk, hinting at decreased volatility. This decrease in volatility signifies lower market unpredictability. Moving forward, the upper Bollinger Band has shifted to $0.507, securing the resistance point. Conversely, the lower Bollinger Band has moved to $0.471, marking the support. EOSUSD chart by TradingView The RSI indicator is present below the midline. Currently at 38.42, the RSI level is decreasing rapidly from its previous level, confirming the selling activities. The downward-pointing slope on the indicator‚Äôs graph refers to significant pressure from the selling side of the market. If selling activities continue for a few more hours, further depreciation can be expected. EOS technical indicators: Levels and action Daily simple moving average (SMA) Period Value ($) Action SMA 3 0.78612 SELL SMA 5 0.80126 SELL SMA 10 0.747243 SELL SMA 21 0.739571 SELL SMA 50 0.733548 SELL SMA 100 0.722357 SELL SMA 200 0.621861 SELL Daily exponential moving average (EMA) Period Value ($) Action EMA 3 0.73577 SELL EMA 5 0.735943 SELL EMA 10 0.730787 SELL EMA 21 0.70242 SELL EMA 50 0.662726 SELL EMA 100 0.667592 SELL EMA 200 0.67631 SELL What to expect from EOS price analysis? EOS price analysis gives a highly bearish prediction regarding ongoing market events. The EOS/USD value has decreased to a $0.478 low in the past 24 hours. If sellers continue to dominate the price chart, we might see further deterioration in price levels to retest the support of $0.475 once again. Is EOS a good investment? EOS has seen more green days in the last month. The coin‚Äôs price decreased by 16% over the last year. However, the circumstances can change, and a recovery cannot be ruled out. A bullish rally may be expected in the latter part of this year (2025), potentially pushing the EOS near $1. Why is EOS down? Following the recent rejection around the $0.50 level on the EOS price chart, sellers gained control and took the price to $0.478. Will EOS price recover? If buyers hold the momentum around $0.726 and strongly defend further, we might see a rebound rally in the coming days. Will EOS reach $2? The highest price that EOS observed last year was $1.34 in December; EOS is sweating to break this level. Suppose the broader cryptocurrency market moves in a bullish direction. In that case, EOS may also follow the trend and is expected to reach near the $2 level by the start of 2027 if everything remains favorable. Will EOS reach $5? EOS was last seen above the $5 level in November 2021. Since then, the EOS value has plummeted significantly; however, the coin is expected to surpass $5 again after 2031. Will EOS reach $10? According to the EOS price prediction, EOS may not achieve the $10 level in the next five years. It will take considerable time and significant growth in the coin‚Äôs market cap to reach $10, possibly after 2035. How high could EOS go? EOS is expected to reach a high price of $4.28 by the end of 2031. Is EOS a dead coin? No, EOS is not a dead coin because it still has an active community. EOS has good brand recognition and is the 184th ranked cryptocurrency. It also observed good bullish sentiment in November last year when the entire crypto market turned green. Is EOS a buy or sell? Considering its active community and ongoing development with potential future breakthroughs, EOS looks like a good buy option, despite the fact that it observed some price stagnation in the past. (Remember, this is not investment advice.) Does EOS have a good long-term Future? According to The Motley Fool, a private financial and investing advice company based in Virginia, EOS is a ‚Äúvery risky choice.‚Äù The publication says EOS‚Äôs future is uncertain, given the scandals and problems surrounding the EOS Foundation and Block‚ÄîOne blockchain company. However, the market speculates that EOS will reach above $4.28 by 2031, but the speculations can change at any time. Recent news/opinion on EOS Vaulta (previously EOS) stated that its Boosted APR Campaign on Binance Simple Earn is active. The campaign offers participants the opportunity to earn up to 16.9% Annual Percentage Rate (APR) on eligible assets. The campaign will continue for another three weeks, providing users with an extended period to participate. The Vaulta Boosted APR Campaign on @binance Simple Earn is ongoing. VaultRAM is designed to provide data storage for financial applications, utilizing RAM architecture. The system will deliver data solutions for Web3 banking, focusing on security, scalability, and optimization for AI applications. The price could reach a maximum of $0.639 during the month. The price could reach a maximum of $0.988045 during the year. EOS price prediction 2028 The average price of EOS is expected to reach a minimum level of $2.31 in 2028. The EOS price can reach a maximum level of $2.63 and an average trading price of $2.47. EOS coin price prediction 2029 In 2029, the price of EOS is expected to reach a minimum price of $2.85. The EOS token can reach a maximum price of $3.18 and an average price of $3.02.
